00001 #include "cs.h"
00002 /* C = alpha*A + beta*B */
00003 cs *cs_add (const cs *A, const cs *B, double alpha, double beta)
00004 {
00005     int p, j, nz = 0, anz, *Cp, *Ci, *Bp, m, n, bnz, *w, values ;
00006     double *x, *Bx, *Cx ;
00007     cs *C ;
00008     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !CS_CSC (B)) return (NULL) ;         /* check inputs */
00009     if (A->m != B->m || A->n != B->n) return (NULL) ;
00010     m = A->m ; anz = A->p [A->n] ;
00011     n = B->n ; Bp = B->p ; Bx = B->x ; bnz = Bp [n] ;
00012     w = cs_calloc (m, sizeof (int)) ;                       /* get workspace */
00013     values = (A->x != NULL) && (Bx != NULL) ;
00014     x = values ? cs_malloc (m, sizeof (double)) : NULL ;    /* get workspace */
00015     C = cs_spalloc (m, n, anz + bnz, values, 0) ;           /* allocate result*/
00016     if (!C || !w || (values && !x)) return (cs_done (C, w, x, 0)) ;
00017     Cp = C->p ; Ci = C->i ; Cx = C->x ;
00018     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
00019     {
00020         Cp [j] = nz ;                   /* column j of C starts here */
00021         nz = cs_scatter (A, j, alpha, w, x, j+1, C, nz) ;   /* alpha*A(:,j)*/
00022         nz = cs_scatter (B, j, beta, w, x, j+1, C, nz) ;    /* beta*B(:,j) */
00023         if (values) for (p = Cp [j] ; p < nz ; p++) Cx [p] = x [Ci [p]] ;
00024     }
00025     Cp [n] = nz ;                       /* finalize the last column of C */
00026     cs_sprealloc (C, 0) ;               /* remove extra space from C */
00027     return (cs_done (C, w, x, 1)) ;     /* success; free workspace, return C */
00028 }
00029 /* clear w */
00030 static int cs_wclear (int mark, int lemax, int *w, int n)
00031 {
00032     int k ;
00033     if (mark < 2 || (mark + lemax < 0))
00034     {
00035         for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) if (w [k] != 0) w [k] = 1 ;
00036         mark = 2 ;
00037     }
00038     return (mark) ;     /* at this point, w [0..n-1] < mark holds */
00039 }

00041 /* keep off-diagonal entries; drop diagonal entries */
00042 static int cs_diag (int i, int j, double aij, void *other) { return (i != j) ; }

00044 /* p = amd(A+A') if symmetric is true, or amd(A'A) otherwise */
00045 int *cs_amd (int order, const cs *A)  /* order 0:natural, 1:Chol, 2:LU, 3:QR */
00046 {
00047     cs *C, *A2, *AT ;
00048     int *Cp, *Ci, *last, *W, *len, *nv, *next, *P, *head, *elen, *degree, *w,
00049         *hhead, *ATp, *ATi, d, dk, dext, lemax = 0, e, elenk, eln, i, j, k, k1,
00050         k2, k3, jlast, ln, dense, nzmax, mindeg = 0, nvi, nvj, nvk, mark, wnvi,
00051         ok, cnz, nel = 0, p, p1, p2, p3, p4, pj, pk, pk1, pk2, pn, q, n, m, t ;
00052     unsigned int h ;
00053     /* --- Construct matrix C ----------------------------------------------- */
00054     if (!CS_CSC (A) || order <= 0 || order > 3) return (NULL) ; /* check */
00055     AT = cs_transpose (A, 0) ;              /* compute A' */
00056     if (!AT) return (NULL) ;
00057     m = A->m ; n = A->n ;
00058     dense = CS_MAX (16, 10 * sqrt ((double) n)) ;   /* find dense threshold */
00059     dense = CS_MIN (n-2, dense) ;
00060     if (order == 1 && n == m)
00061     {
00062         C = cs_add (A, AT, 0, 0) ;          /* C = A+A' */
00063     }
00064     else if (order == 2)
00065     {
00066         ATp = AT->p ;                       /* drop dense columns from AT */
00067         ATi = AT->i ;
00068         for (p2 = 0, j = 0 ; j < m ; j++)
00069         {
00070             p = ATp [j] ;                   /* column j of AT starts here */
00071             ATp [j] = p2 ;                  /* new column j starts here */
00072             if (ATp [j+1] - p > dense) continue ;   /* skip dense col j */
00073             for ( ; p < ATp [j+1] ; p++) ATi [p2++] = ATi [p] ;
00074         }
00075         ATp [m] = p2 ;                      /* finalize AT */
00076         A2 = cs_transpose (AT, 0) ;         /* A2 = AT' */
00077         C = A2 ? cs_multiply (AT, A2) : NULL ;  /* C=A'*A with no dense rows */
00078         cs_spfree (A2) ;
00079     }
00080     else
00081     {
00082         C = cs_multiply (AT, A) ;           /* C=A'*A */
00083     }
00084     cs_spfree (AT) ;
00085     if (!C) return (NULL) ;
00086     cs_fkeep (C, &cs_diag, NULL) ;          /* drop diagonal entries */
00087     Cp = C->p ;
00088     cnz = Cp [n] ;
00089     P = cs_malloc (n+1, sizeof (int)) ;     /* allocate result */
00090     W = cs_malloc (8*(n+1), sizeof (int)) ; /* get workspace */
00091     t = cnz + cnz/5 + 2*n ;                 /* add elbow room to C */
00092     if (!P || !W || !cs_sprealloc (C, t)) return (cs_idone (P, C, W, 0)) ;
00093     len  = W           ; nv     = W +   (n+1) ; next   = W + 2*(n+1) ;
00094     head = W + 3*(n+1) ; elen   = W + 4*(n+1) ; degree = W + 5*(n+1) ;
00095     w    = W + 6*(n+1) ; hhead  = W + 7*(n+1) ;
00096     last = P ;                              /* use P as workspace for last */
00097     /* --- Initialize quotient graph ---------------------------------------- */
00098     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) len [k] = Cp [k+1] - Cp [k] ;
00099     len [n] = 0 ;
00100     nzmax = C->nzmax ;
00101     Ci = C->i ;
00102     for (i = 0 ; i <= n ; i++)
00103     {
00104         head [i] = -1 ;                     /* degree list i is empty */
00105         last [i] = -1 ;
00106         next [i] = -1 ;
00107         hhead [i] = -1 ;                    /* hash list i is empty */
00108         nv [i] = 1 ;                        /* node i is just one node */
00109         w [i] = 1 ;                         /* node i is alive */
00110         elen [i] = 0 ;                      /* Ek of node i is empty */
00111         degree [i] = len [i] ;              /* degree of node i */
00112     }
00113     mark = cs_wclear (0, 0, w, n) ;         /* clear w */
00114     elen [n] = -2 ;                         /* n is a dead element */
00115     Cp [n] = -1 ;                           /* n is a root of assembly tree */
00116     w [n] = 0 ;                             /* n is a dead element */
00117     /* --- Initialize degree lists ------------------------------------------ */
00118     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++)
00119     {
00120         d = degree [i] ;
00121         if (d == 0)                         /* node i is empty */
00122         {
00123             elen [i] = -2 ;                 /* element i is dead */
00124             nel++ ;
00125             Cp [i] = -1 ;                   /* i is a root of assembly tree */
00126             w [i] = 0 ;
00127         }
00128         else if (d > dense)                 /* node i is dense */
00129         {
00130             nv [i] = 0 ;                    /* absorb i into element n */
00131             elen [i] = -1 ;                 /* node i is dead */
00132             nel++ ;
00133             Cp [i] = CS_FLIP (n) ;
00134             nv [n]++ ;
00135         }
00136         else
00137         {
00138             if (head [d] != -1) last [head [d]] = i ;
00139             next [i] = head [d] ;           /* put node i in degree list d */
00140             head [d] = i ;
00141         }
00142     }
00143     while (nel < n)                         /* while (selecting pivots) do */
00144     {
00145         /* --- Select node of minimum approximate degree -------------------- */
00146         for (k = -1 ; mindeg < n && (k = head [mindeg]) == -1 ; mindeg++) ;
00147         if (next [k] != -1) last [next [k]] = -1 ;
00148         head [mindeg] = next [k] ;          /* remove k from degree list */
00149         elenk = elen [k] ;                  /* elenk = |Ek| */
00150         nvk = nv [k] ;                      /* # of nodes k represents */
00151         nel += nvk ;                        /* nv[k] nodes of A eliminated */
00152         /* --- Garbage collection ------------------------------------------- */
00153         if (elenk > 0 && cnz + mindeg >= nzmax)
00154         {
00155             for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
00156             {
00157                 if ((p = Cp [j]) >= 0)      /* j is a live node or element */
00158                 {
00159                     Cp [j] = Ci [p] ;       /* save first entry of object */
00160                     Ci [p] = CS_FLIP (j) ;  /* first entry is now CS_FLIP(j) */
00161                 }
00162             }
00163             for (q = 0, p = 0 ; p < cnz ; ) /* scan all of memory */
00164             {
00165                 if ((j = CS_FLIP (Ci [p++])) >= 0)  /* found object j */
00166                 {
00167                     Ci [q] = Cp [j] ;       /* restore first entry of object */
00168                     Cp [j] = q++ ;          /* new pointer to object j */
00169                     for (k3 = 0 ; k3 < len [j]-1 ; k3++) Ci [q++] = Ci [p++] ;
00170                 }
00171             }
00172             cnz = q ;                       /* Ci [cnz...nzmax-1] now free */
00173         }
00174         /* --- Construct new element ---------------------------------------- */
00175         dk = 0 ;
00176         nv [k] = -nvk ;                     /* flag k as in Lk */
00177         p = Cp [k] ;
00178         pk1 = (elenk == 0) ? p : cnz ;      /* do in place if elen[k] == 0 */
00179         pk2 = pk1 ;
00180         for (k1 = 1 ; k1 <= elenk + 1 ; k1++)
00181         {
00182             if (k1 > elenk)
00183             {
00184                 e = k ;                     /* search the nodes in k */
00185                 pj = p ;                    /* list of nodes starts at Ci[pj]*/
00186                 ln = len [k] - elenk ;      /* length of list of nodes in k */
00187             }
00188             else
00189             {
00190                 e = Ci [p++] ;              /* search the nodes in e */
00191                 pj = Cp [e] ;
00192                 ln = len [e] ;              /* length of list of nodes in e */
00193             }
00194             for (k2 = 1 ; k2 <= ln ; k2++)
00195             {
00196                 i = Ci [pj++] ;
00197                 if ((nvi = nv [i]) <= 0) continue ; /* node i dead, or seen */
00198                 dk += nvi ;                 /* degree[Lk] += size of node i */
00199                 nv [i] = -nvi ;             /* negate nv[i] to denote i in Lk*/
00200                 Ci [pk2++] = i ;            /* place i in Lk */
00201                 if (next [i] != -1) last [next [i]] = last [i] ;
00202                 if (last [i] != -1)         /* remove i from degree list */
00203                 {
00204                     next [last [i]] = next [i] ;
00205                 }
00206                 else
00207                 {
00208                     head [degree [i]] = next [i] ;
00209                 }
00210             }
00211             if (e != k)
00212             {
00213                 Cp [e] = CS_FLIP (k) ;      /* absorb e into k */
00214                 w [e] = 0 ;                 /* e is now a dead element */
00215             }
00216         }
00217         if (elenk != 0) cnz = pk2 ;         /* Ci [cnz...nzmax] is free */
00218         degree [k] = dk ;                   /* external degree of k - |Lk\i| */
00219         Cp [k] = pk1 ;                      /* element k is in Ci[pk1..pk2-1] */
00220         len [k] = pk2 - pk1 ;
00221         elen [k] = -2 ;                     /* k is now an element */
00222         /* --- Find set differences ----------------------------------------- */
00223         mark = cs_wclear (mark, lemax, w, n) ;  /* clear w if necessary */
00224         for (pk = pk1 ; pk < pk2 ; pk++)    /* scan 1: find |Le\Lk| */
00225         {
00226             i = Ci [pk] ;
00227             if ((eln = elen [i]) <= 0) continue ;/* skip if elen[i] empty */
00228             nvi = -nv [i] ;                      /* nv [i] was negated */
00229             wnvi = mark - nvi ;
00230             for (p = Cp [i] ; p <= Cp [i] + eln - 1 ; p++)  /* scan Ei */
00231             {
00232                 e = Ci [p] ;
00233                 if (w [e] >= mark)
00234                 {
00235                     w [e] -= nvi ;          /* decrement |Le\Lk| */
00236                 }
00237                 else if (w [e] != 0)        /* ensure e is a live element */
00238                 {
00239                     w [e] = degree [e] + wnvi ; /* 1st time e seen in scan 1 */
00240                 }
00241             }
00242         }
00243         /* --- Degree update ------------------------------------------------ */
00244         for (pk = pk1 ; pk < pk2 ; pk++)    /* scan2: degree update */
00245         {
00246             i = Ci [pk] ;                   /* consider node i in Lk */
00247             p1 = Cp [i] ;
00248             p2 = p1 + elen [i] - 1 ;
00249             pn = p1 ;
00250             for (h = 0, d = 0, p = p1 ; p <= p2 ; p++)    /* scan Ei */
00251             {
00252                 e = Ci [p] ;
00253                 if (w [e] != 0)             /* e is an unabsorbed element */
00254                 {
00255                     dext = w [e] - mark ;   /* dext = |Le\Lk| */
00256                     if (dext > 0)
00257                     {
00258                         d += dext ;         /* sum up the set differences */
00259                         Ci [pn++] = e ;     /* keep e in Ei */
00260                         h += e ;            /* compute the hash of node i */
00261                     }
00262                     else
00263                     {
00264                         Cp [e] = CS_FLIP (k) ;  /* aggressive absorb. e->k */
00265                         w [e] = 0 ;             /* e is a dead element */
00266                     }
00267                 }
00268             }
00269             elen [i] = pn - p1 + 1 ;        /* elen[i] = |Ei| */
00270             p3 = pn ;
00271             p4 = p1 + len [i] ;
00272             for (p = p2 + 1 ; p < p4 ; p++) /* prune edges in Ai */
00273             {
00274                 j = Ci [p] ;
00275                 if ((nvj = nv [j]) <= 0) continue ; /* node j dead or in Lk */
00276                 d += nvj ;                  /* degree(i) += |j| */
00277                 Ci [pn++] = j ;             /* place j in node list of i */
00278                 h += j ;                    /* compute hash for node i */
00279             }
00280             if (d == 0)                     /* check for mass elimination */
00281             {
00282                 Cp [i] = CS_FLIP (k) ;      /* absorb i into k */
00283                 nvi = -nv [i] ;
00284                 dk -= nvi ;                 /* |Lk| -= |i| */
00285                 nvk += nvi ;                /* |k| += nv[i] */
00286                 nel += nvi ;
00287                 nv [i] = 0 ;
00288                 elen [i] = -1 ;             /* node i is dead */
00289             }
00290             else
00291             {
00292                 degree [i] = CS_MIN (degree [i], d) ;   /* update degree(i) */
00293                 Ci [pn] = Ci [p3] ;         /* move first node to end */
00294                 Ci [p3] = Ci [p1] ;         /* move 1st el. to end of Ei */
00295                 Ci [p1] = k ;               /* add k as 1st element in of Ei */
00296                 len [i] = pn - p1 + 1 ;     /* new len of adj. list of node i */
00297                 h %= n ;                    /* finalize hash of i */
00298                 next [i] = hhead [h] ;      /* place i in hash bucket */
00299                 hhead [h] = i ;
00300                 last [i] = h ;              /* save hash of i in last[i] */
00301             }
00302         }                                   /* scan2 is done */
00303         degree [k] = dk ;                   /* finalize |Lk| */
00304         lemax = CS_MAX (lemax, dk) ;
00305         mark = cs_wclear (mark+lemax, lemax, w, n) ;    /* clear w */
00306         /* --- Supernode detection ------------------------------------------ */
00307         for (pk = pk1 ; pk < pk2 ; pk++)
00308         {
00309             i = Ci [pk] ;
00310             if (nv [i] >= 0) continue ;         /* skip if i is dead */
00311             h = last [i] ;                      /* scan hash bucket of node i */
00312             i = hhead [h] ;
00313             hhead [h] = -1 ;                    /* hash bucket will be empty */
00314             for ( ; i != -1 && next [i] != -1 ; i = next [i], mark++)
00315             {
00316                 ln = len [i] ;
00317                 eln = elen [i] ;
00318                 for (p = Cp [i]+1 ; p <= Cp [i] + ln-1 ; p++) w [Ci [p]] = mark;
00319                 jlast = i ;
00320                 for (j = next [i] ; j != -1 ; ) /* compare i with all j */
00321                 {
00322                     ok = (len [j] == ln) && (elen [j] == eln) ;
00323                     for (p = Cp [j] + 1 ; ok && p <= Cp [j] + ln - 1 ; p++)
00324                     {
00325                         if (w [Ci [p]] != mark) ok = 0 ;    /* compare i and j*/
00326                     }
00327                     if (ok)                     /* i and j are identical */
00328                     {
00329                         Cp [j] = CS_FLIP (i) ;  /* absorb j into i */
00330                         nv [i] += nv [j] ;
00331                         nv [j] = 0 ;
00332                         elen [j] = -1 ;         /* node j is dead */
00333                         j = next [j] ;          /* delete j from hash bucket */
00334                         next [jlast] = j ;
00335                     }
00336                     else
00337                     {
00338                         jlast = j ;             /* j and i are different */
00339                         j = next [j] ;
00340                     }
00341                 }
00342             }
00343         }
00344         /* --- Finalize new element------------------------------------------ */
00345         for (p = pk1, pk = pk1 ; pk < pk2 ; pk++)   /* finalize Lk */
00346         {
00347             i = Ci [pk] ;
00348             if ((nvi = -nv [i]) <= 0) continue ;/* skip if i is dead */
00349             nv [i] = nvi ;                      /* restore nv[i] */
00350             d = degree [i] + dk - nvi ;         /* compute external degree(i) */
00351             d = CS_MIN (d, n - nel - nvi) ;
00352             if (head [d] != -1) last [head [d]] = i ;
00353             next [i] = head [d] ;               /* put i back in degree list */
00354             last [i] = -1 ;
00355             head [d] = i ;
00356             mindeg = CS_MIN (mindeg, d) ;       /* find new minimum degree */
00357             degree [i] = d ;
00358             Ci [p++] = i ;                      /* place i in Lk */
00359         }
00360         nv [k] = nvk ;                      /* # nodes absorbed into k */
00361         if ((len [k] = p-pk1) == 0)         /* length of adj list of element k*/
00362         {
00363             Cp [k] = -1 ;                   /* k is a root of the tree */
00364             w [k] = 0 ;                     /* k is now a dead element */
00365         }
00366         if (elenk != 0) cnz = p ;           /* free unused space in Lk */
00367     }
00368     /* --- Postordering ----------------------------------------------------- */
00369     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) Cp [i] = CS_FLIP (Cp [i]) ;/* fix assembly tree */
00370     for (j = 0 ; j <= n ; j++) head [j] = -1 ;
00371     for (j = n ; j >= 0 ; j--)              /* place unordered nodes in lists */
00372     {
00373         if (nv [j] > 0) continue ;          /* skip if j is an element */
00374         next [j] = head [Cp [j]] ;          /* place j in list of its parent */
00375         head [Cp [j]] = j ;
00376     }
00377     for (e = n ; e >= 0 ; e--)              /* place elements in lists */
00378     {
00379         if (nv [e] <= 0) continue ;         /* skip unless e is an element */
00380         if (Cp [e] != -1)
00381         {
00382             next [e] = head [Cp [e]] ;      /* place e in list of its parent */
00383             head [Cp [e]] = e ;
00384         }
00385     }
00386     for (k = 0, i = 0 ; i <= n ; i++)       /* postorder the assembly tree */
00387     {
00388         if (Cp [i] == -1) k = cs_tdfs (i, k, head, next, P, w) ;
00389     }
00390     return (cs_idone (P, C, W, 1)) ;
00391 }
00392 /* L = chol (A, [pinv parent cp]), pinv is optional */
00393 csn *cs_chol (const cs *A, const css *S)
00394 {
00395     double d, lki, *Lx, *x, *Cx ;
00396     int top, i, p, k, n, *Li, *Lp, *cp, *pinv, *s, *c, *parent, *Cp, *Ci ;
00397     cs *L, *C, *E ;
00398     csn *N ;
00399     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !S || !S->cp || !S->parent) return (NULL) ;
00400     n = A->n ;
00401     N = cs_calloc (1, sizeof (csn)) ;       /* allocate result */
00402     c = cs_malloc (2*n, sizeof (int)) ;     /* get int workspace */
00403     x = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (double)) ;    /* get double workspace */
00404     cp = S->cp ; pinv = S->pinv ; parent = S->parent ;
00405     C = pinv ? cs_symperm (A, pinv, 1) : ((cs *) A) ;
00406     E = pinv ? C : NULL ;           /* E is alias for A, or a copy E=A(p,p) */
00407     if (!N || !c || !x || !C) return (cs_ndone (N, E, c, x, 0)) ;
00408     s = c + n ;
00409     Cp = C->p ; Ci = C->i ; Cx = C->x ;
00410     N->L = L = cs_spalloc (n, n, cp [n], 1, 0) ;    /* allocate result */
00411     if (!L) return (cs_ndone (N, E, c, x, 0)) ;
00412     Lp = L->p ; Li = L->i ; Lx = L->x ;
00413     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) Lp [k] = c [k] = cp [k] ;
00414     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)       /* compute L(:,k) for L*L' = C */
00415     {
00416         /* --- Nonzero pattern of L(k,:) ------------------------------------ */
00417         top = cs_ereach (C, k, parent, s, c) ;      /* find pattern of L(k,:) */
00418         x [k] = 0 ;                                 /* x (0:k) is now zero */
00419         for (p = Cp [k] ; p < Cp [k+1] ; p++)       /* x = full(triu(C(:,k))) */
00420         {
00421             if (Ci [p] <= k) x [Ci [p]] = Cx [p] ;
00422         }
00423         d = x [k] ;                     /* d = C(k,k) */
00424         x [k] = 0 ;                     /* clear x for k+1st iteration */
00425         /* --- Triangular solve --------------------------------------------- */
00426         for ( ; top < n ; top++)    /* solve L(0:k-1,0:k-1) * x = C(:,k) */
00427         {
00428             i = s [top] ;               /* s [top..n-1] is pattern of L(k,:) */
00429             lki = x [i] / Lx [Lp [i]] ; /* L(k,i) = x (i) / L(i,i) */
00430             x [i] = 0 ;                 /* clear x for k+1st iteration */
00431             for (p = Lp [i] + 1 ; p < c [i] ; p++)
00432             {
00433                 x [Li [p]] -= Lx [p] * lki ;
00434             }
00435             d -= lki * lki ;            /* d = d - L(k,i)*L(k,i) */
00436             p = c [i]++ ;
00437             Li [p] = k ;                /* store L(k,i) in column i */
00438             Lx [p] = lki ;
00439         }
00440         /* --- Compute L(k,k) ----------------------------------------------- */
00441         if (d <= 0) return (cs_ndone (N, E, c, x, 0)) ; /* not pos def */
00442         p = c [k]++ ;
00443         Li [p] = k ;                /* store L(k,k) = sqrt (d) in column k */
00444         Lx [p] = sqrt (d) ;
00445     }
00446     Lp [n] = cp [n] ;               /* finalize L */
00447     return (cs_ndone (N, E, c, x, 1)) ; /* success: free E,s,x; return N */
00448 }
00449 /* x=A\b where A is symmetric positive definite; b overwritten with solution */
00450 int cs_cholsol (int order, const cs *A, double *b)
00451 {
00452     double *x ;
00453     css *S ;
00454     csn *N ;
00455     int n, ok ;
00456     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !b) return (0) ;     /* check inputs */
00457     n = A->n ;
00458     S = cs_schol (order, A) ;               /* ordering and symbolic analysis */
00459     N = cs_chol (A, S) ;                    /* numeric Cholesky factorization */
00460     x = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (double)) ;    /* get workspace */
00461     ok = (S && N && x) ;
00462     if (ok)
00463     {
00464         cs_ipvec (S->pinv, b, x, n) ;   /* x = P*b */
00465         cs_lsolve (N->L, x) ;           /* x = L\x */
00466         cs_ltsolve (N->L, x) ;          /* x = L'\x */
00467         cs_pvec (S->pinv, x, b, n) ;    /* b = P'*x */
00468     }
00469     cs_free (x) ;
00470     cs_sfree (S) ;
00471     cs_nfree (N) ;
00472     return (ok) ;
00473 }
00474 /* C = compressed-column form of a triplet matrix T */
00475 cs *cs_compress (const cs *T)
00476 {
00477     int m, n, nz, p, k, *Cp, *Ci, *w, *Ti, *Tj ;
00478     double *Cx, *Tx ;
00479     cs *C ;
00480     if (!CS_TRIPLET (T)) return (NULL) ;                /* check inputs */
00481     m = T->m ; n = T->n ; Ti = T->i ; Tj = T->p ; Tx = T->x ; nz = T->nz ;
00482     C = cs_spalloc (m, n, nz, Tx != NULL, 0) ;          /* allocate result */
00483     w = cs_calloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;                   /* get workspace */
00484     if (!C || !w) return (cs_done (C, w, NULL, 0)) ;    /* out of memory */
00485     Cp = C->p ; Ci = C->i ; Cx = C->x ;
00486     for (k = 0 ; k < nz ; k++) w [Tj [k]]++ ;           /* column counts */
00487     cs_cumsum (Cp, w, n) ;                              /* column pointers */
00488     for (k = 0 ; k < nz ; k++)
00489     {
00490         Ci [p = w [Tj [k]]++] = Ti [k] ;    /* A(i,j) is the pth entry in C */
00491         if (Cx) Cx [p] = Tx [k] ;
00492     }
00493     return (cs_done (C, w, NULL, 1)) ;      /* success; free w and return C */
00494 }
00495 /* column counts of LL'=A or LL'=A'A, given parent & post ordering */
00496 #define HEAD(k,j) (ata ? head [k] : j)
00497 #define NEXT(J)   (ata ? next [J] : -1)
00498 static void init_ata (cs *AT, const int *post, int *w, int **head, int **next)
00499 {
00500     int i, k, p, m = AT->n, n = AT->m, *ATp = AT->p, *ATi = AT->i ;
00501     *head = w+4*n, *next = w+5*n+1 ;
00502     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) w [post [k]] = k ;    /* invert post */
00503     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++)
00504     {
00505         for (k = n, p = ATp[i] ; p < ATp[i+1] ; p++) k = CS_MIN (k, w [ATi[p]]);
00506         (*next) [i] = (*head) [k] ;     /* place row i in linked list k */
00507         (*head) [k] = i ;
00508     }
00509 }
00510 int *cs_counts (const cs *A, const int *parent, const int *post, int ata)
00511 {
00512     int i, j, k, n, m, J, s, p, q, jleaf, *ATp, *ATi, *maxfirst, *prevleaf,
00513         *ancestor, *head = NULL, *next = NULL, *colcount, *w, *first, *delta ;
00514     cs *AT ;
00515     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !parent || !post) return (NULL) ;    /* check inputs */
00516     m = A->m ; n = A->n ;
00517     s = 4*n + (ata ? (n+m+1) : 0) ;
00518     delta = colcount = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;    /* allocate result */
00519     w = cs_malloc (s, sizeof (int)) ;                   /* get workspace */
00520     AT = cs_transpose (A, 0) ;                          /* AT = A' */
00521     if (!AT || !colcount || !w) return (cs_idone (colcount, AT, w, 0)) ;
00522     ancestor = w ; maxfirst = w+n ; prevleaf = w+2*n ; first = w+3*n ;
00523     for (k = 0 ; k < s ; k++) w [k] = -1 ;      /* clear workspace w [0..s-1] */
00524     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)                   /* find first [j] */
00525     {
00526         j = post [k] ;
00527         delta [j] = (first [j] == -1) ? 1 : 0 ;  /* delta[j]=1 if j is a leaf */
00528         for ( ; j != -1 && first [j] == -1 ; j = parent [j]) first [j] = k ;
00529     }
00530     ATp = AT->p ; ATi = AT->i ;
00531     if (ata) init_ata (AT, post, w, &head, &next) ;
00532     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) ancestor [i] = i ; /* each node in its own set */
00533     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)
00534     {
00535         j = post [k] ;          /* j is the kth node in postordered etree */
00536         if (parent [j] != -1) delta [parent [j]]-- ;    /* j is not a root */
00537         for (J = HEAD (k,j) ; J != -1 ; J = NEXT (J))   /* J=j for LL'=A case */
00538         {
00539             for (p = ATp [J] ; p < ATp [J+1] ; p++)
00540             {
00541                 i = ATi [p] ;
00542                 q = cs_leaf (i, j, first, maxfirst, prevleaf, ancestor, &jleaf);
00543                 if (jleaf >= 1) delta [j]++ ;   /* A(i,j) is in skeleton */
00544                 if (jleaf == 2) delta [q]-- ;   /* account for overlap in q */
00545             }
00546         }
00547         if (parent [j] != -1) ancestor [j] = parent [j] ;
00548     }
00549     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)           /* sum up delta's of each child */
00550     {
00551         if (parent [j] != -1) colcount [parent [j]] += colcount [j] ;
00552     }
00553     return (cs_idone (colcount, AT, w, 1)) ;    /* success: free workspace */
00554 } 
00555 /* p [0..n] = cumulative sum of c [0..n-1], and then copy p [0..n-1] into c */
00556 double cs_cumsum (int *p, int *c, int n)
00557 {
00558     int i, nz = 0 ;
00559     double nz2 = 0 ;
00560     if (!p || !c) return (-1) ;     /* check inputs */
00561     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++)
00562     {
00563         p [i] = nz ;
00564         nz += c [i] ;
00565         nz2 += c [i] ;              /* also in double to avoid int overflow */
00566         c [i] = p [i] ;             /* also copy p[0..n-1] back into c[0..n-1]*/
00567     }
00568     p [n] = nz ;
00569     return (nz2) ;                  /* return sum (c [0..n-1]) */
00570 }
00571 /* depth-first-search of the graph of a matrix, starting at node j */
00572 int cs_dfs (int j, cs *G, int top, int *xi, int *pstack, const int *pinv)
00573 {
00574     int i, p, p2, done, jnew, head = 0, *Gp, *Gi ;
00575     if (!CS_CSC (G) || !xi || !pstack) return (-1) ;    /* check inputs */
00576     Gp = G->p ; Gi = G->i ;
00577     xi [0] = j ;                /* initialize the recursion stack */
00578     while (head >= 0)
00579     {
00580         j = xi [head] ;         /* get j from the top of the recursion stack */
00581         jnew = pinv ? (pinv [j]) : j ;
00582         if (!CS_MARKED (Gp, j))
00583         {
00584             CS_MARK (Gp, j) ;       /* mark node j as visited */
00585             pstack [head] = (jnew < 0) ? 0 : CS_UNFLIP (Gp [jnew]) ;
00586         }
00587         done = 1 ;                  /* node j done if no unvisited neighbors */
00588         p2 = (jnew < 0) ? 0 : CS_UNFLIP (Gp [jnew+1]) ;
00589         for (p = pstack [head] ; p < p2 ; p++)  /* examine all neighbors of j */
00590         {
00591             i = Gi [p] ;            /* consider neighbor node i */
00592             if (CS_MARKED (Gp, i)) continue ;   /* skip visited node i */
00593             pstack [head] = p ;     /* pause depth-first search of node j */
00594             xi [++head] = i ;       /* start dfs at node i */
00595             done = 0 ;              /* node j is not done */
00596             break ;                 /* break, to start dfs (i) */
00597         }
00598         if (done)               /* depth-first search at node j is done */
00599         {
00600             head-- ;            /* remove j from the recursion stack */
00601             xi [--top] = j ;    /* and place in the output stack */
00602         }
00603     }
00604     return (top) ;
00605 }
00606 /* breadth-first search for coarse decomposition (C0,C1,R1 or R0,R3,C3) */
00607 static int cs_bfs (const cs *A, int n, int *wi, int *wj, int *queue,
00608     const int *imatch, const int *jmatch, int mark)
00609 {
00610     int *Ap, *Ai, head = 0, tail = 0, j, i, p, j2 ;
00611     cs *C ;
00612     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)           /* place all unmatched nodes in queue */
00613     {
00614         if (imatch [j] >= 0) continue ; /* skip j if matched */
00615         wj [j] = 0 ;                    /* j in set C0 (R0 if transpose) */
00616         queue [tail++] = j ;            /* place unmatched col j in queue */
00617     }
00618     if (tail == 0) return (1) ;         /* quick return if no unmatched nodes */
00619     C = (mark == 1) ? ((cs *) A) : cs_transpose (A, 0) ;
00620     if (!C) return (0) ;                /* bfs of C=A' to find R3,C3 from R0 */
00621     Ap = C->p ; Ai = C->i ;
00622     while (head < tail)                 /* while queue is not empty */
00623     {
00624         j = queue [head++] ;            /* get the head of the queue */
00625         for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
00626         {
00627             i = Ai [p] ;
00628             if (wi [i] >= 0) continue ; /* skip if i is marked */
00629             wi [i] = mark ;             /* i in set R1 (C3 if transpose) */
00630             j2 = jmatch [i] ;           /* traverse alternating path to j2 */
00631             if (wj [j2] >= 0) continue ;/* skip j2 if it is marked */
00632             wj [j2] = mark ;            /* j2 in set C1 (R3 if transpose) */
00633             queue [tail++] = j2 ;       /* add j2 to queue */
00634         }
00635     }
00636     if (mark != 1) cs_spfree (C) ;      /* free A' if it was created */
00637     return (1) ;
00638 }
00639 
00640 /* collect matched rows and columns into p and q */
00641 static void cs_matched (int n, const int *wj, const int *imatch, int *p, int *q,
00642     int *cc, int *rr, int set, int mark)
00643 {
00644     int kc = cc [set], j ;
00645     int kr = rr [set-1] ;
00646     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
00647     {
00648         if (wj [j] != mark) continue ;      /* skip if j is not in C set */
00649         p [kr++] = imatch [j] ;
00650         q [kc++] = j ;
00651     }
00652     cc [set+1] = kc ;
00653     rr [set] = kr ;
00654 }
00655 
00656 /* collect unmatched rows into the permutation vector p */
00657 static void cs_unmatched (int m, const int *wi, int *p, int *rr, int set)
00658 {
00659     int i, kr = rr [set] ;
00660     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) if (wi [i] == 0) p [kr++] = i ;
00661     rr [set+1] = kr ;
00662 }
00663 
00664 /* return 1 if row i is in R2 */
00665 static int cs_rprune (int i, int j, double aij, void *other)
00666 {
00667     int *rr = (int *) other ;
00668     return (i >= rr [1] && i < rr [2]) ;
00669 }
00670 
00671 /* Given A, compute coarse and then fine dmperm */
00672 csd *cs_dmperm (const cs *A, int seed)
00673 {
00674     int m, n, i, j, k, cnz, nc, *jmatch, *imatch, *wi, *wj, *pinv, *Cp, *Ci,
00675         *ps, *rs, nb1, nb2, *p, *q, *cc, *rr, *r, *s, ok ;
00676     cs *C ;
00677     csd *D, *scc ;
00678     /* --- Maximum matching ------------------------------------------------- */
00679     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;            /* check inputs */
00680     m = A->m ; n = A->n ;
00681     D = cs_dalloc (m, n) ;                      /* allocate result */
00682     if (!D) return (NULL) ;
00683     p = D->p ; q = D->q ; r = D->r ; s = D->s ; cc = D->cc ; rr = D->rr ;
00684     jmatch = cs_maxtrans (A, seed) ;            /* max transversal */
00685     imatch = jmatch + m ;                       /* imatch = inverse of jmatch */
00686     if (!jmatch) return (cs_ddone (D, NULL, jmatch, 0)) ;
00687     /* --- Coarse decomposition --------------------------------------------- */
00688     wi = r ; wj = s ;                           /* use r and s as workspace */
00689     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++) wj [j] = -1 ;     /* unmark all cols for bfs */
00690     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) wi [i] = -1 ;     /* unmark all rows for bfs */
00691     cs_bfs (A, n, wi, wj, q, imatch, jmatch, 1) ;       /* find C1, R1 from C0*/
00692     ok = cs_bfs (A, m, wj, wi, p, jmatch, imatch, 3) ;  /* find R3, C3 from R0*/
00693     if (!ok) return (cs_ddone (D, NULL, jmatch, 0)) ;
00694     cs_unmatched (n, wj, q, cc, 0) ;                    /* unmatched set C0 */
00695     cs_matched (n, wj, imatch, p, q, cc, rr, 1, 1) ;    /* set R1 and C1 */
00696     cs_matched (n, wj, imatch, p, q, cc, rr, 2, -1) ;   /* set R2 and C2 */
00697     cs_matched (n, wj, imatch, p, q, cc, rr, 3, 3) ;    /* set R3 and C3 */
00698     cs_unmatched (m, wi, p, rr, 3) ;                    /* unmatched set R0 */
00699     cs_free (jmatch) ;
00700     /* --- Fine decomposition ----------------------------------------------- */
00701     pinv = cs_pinv (p, m) ;         /* pinv=p' */
00702     if (!pinv) return (cs_ddone (D, NULL, NULL, 0)) ;
00703     C = cs_permute (A, pinv, q, 0) ;/* C=A(p,q) (it will hold A(R2,C2)) */
00704     cs_free (pinv) ;
00705     if (!C) return (cs_ddone (D, NULL, NULL, 0)) ;
00706     Cp = C->p ;
00707     nc = cc [3] - cc [2] ;          /* delete cols C0, C1, and C3 from C */
00708     if (cc [2] > 0) for (j = cc [2] ; j <= cc [3] ; j++) Cp [j-cc[2]] = Cp [j] ;
00709     C->n = nc ;
00710     if (rr [2] - rr [1] < m)        /* delete rows R0, R1, and R3 from C */
00711     {
00712         cs_fkeep (C, cs_rprune, rr) ;
00713         cnz = Cp [nc] ;
00714         Ci = C->i ;
00715         if (rr [1] > 0) for (k = 0 ; k < cnz ; k++) Ci [k] -= rr [1] ;
00716     }
00717     C->m = nc ;
00718     scc = cs_scc (C) ;              /* find strongly connected components of C*/
00719     if (!scc) return (cs_ddone (D, C, NULL, 0)) ;
00720     /* --- Combine coarse and fine decompositions --------------------------- */
00721     ps = scc->p ;                   /* C(ps,ps) is the permuted matrix */
00722     rs = scc->r ;                   /* kth block is rs[k]..rs[k+1]-1 */
00723     nb1 = scc->nb  ;                /* # of blocks of A(R2,C2) */
00724     for (k = 0 ; k < nc ; k++) wj [k] = q [ps [k] + cc [2]] ;
00725     for (k = 0 ; k < nc ; k++) q [k + cc [2]] = wj [k] ;
00726     for (k = 0 ; k < nc ; k++) wi [k] = p [ps [k] + rr [1]] ;
00727     for (k = 0 ; k < nc ; k++) p [k + rr [1]] = wi [k] ;
00728     nb2 = 0 ;                       /* create the fine block partitions */
00729     r [0] = s [0] = 0 ;
00730     if (cc [2] > 0) nb2++ ;         /* leading coarse block A (R1, [C0 C1]) */
00731     for (k = 0 ; k < nb1 ; k++)     /* coarse block A (R2,C2) */
00732     {
00733         r [nb2] = rs [k] + rr [1] ; /* A (R2,C2) splits into nb1 fine blocks */
00734         s [nb2] = rs [k] + cc [2] ;
00735         nb2++ ;
00736     }
00737     if (rr [2] < m)
00738     {
00739         r [nb2] = rr [2] ;          /* trailing coarse block A ([R3 R0], C3) */
00740         s [nb2] = cc [3] ;
00741         nb2++ ;
00742     }
00743     r [nb2] = m ;
00744     s [nb2] = n ;
00745     D->nb = nb2 ;
00746     cs_dfree (scc) ;
00747     return (cs_ddone (D, C, NULL, 1)) ;
00748 }
00749 static int cs_tol (int i, int j, double aij, void *tol)
00750 {
00751     return (fabs (aij) > *((double *) tol)) ;
00752 }
00753 int cs_droptol (cs *A, double tol)
00754 {
00755     return (cs_fkeep (A, &cs_tol, &tol)) ;    /* keep all large entries */
00756 }
00757 static int cs_nonzero (int i, int j, double aij, void *other)
00758 {
00759     return (aij != 0) ;
00760 }
00761 int cs_dropzeros (cs *A)
00762 {
00763     return (cs_fkeep (A, &cs_nonzero, NULL)) ;  /* keep all nonzero entries */
00764 } 
00765 /* remove duplicate entries from A */
00766 int cs_dupl (cs *A)
00767 {
00768     int i, j, p, q, nz = 0, n, m, *Ap, *Ai, *w ;
00769     double *Ax ;
00770     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (0) ;               /* check inputs */
00771     m = A->m ; n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ;
00772     w = cs_malloc (m, sizeof (int)) ;           /* get workspace */
00773     if (!w) return (0) ;                        /* out of memory */
00774     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) w [i] = -1 ;      /* row i not yet seen */
00775     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
00776     {
00777         q = nz ;                                /* column j will start at q */
00778         for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
00779         {
00780             i = Ai [p] ;                        /* A(i,j) is nonzero */
00781             if (w [i] >= q)
00782             {
00783                 Ax [w [i]] += Ax [p] ;          /* A(i,j) is a duplicate */
00784             }
00785             else
00786             {
00787                 w [i] = nz ;                    /* record where row i occurs */
00788                 Ai [nz] = i ;                   /* keep A(i,j) */
00789                 Ax [nz++] = Ax [p] ;
00790             }
00791         }
00792         Ap [j] = q ;                            /* record start of column j */
00793     }
00794     Ap [n] = nz ;                               /* finalize A */
00795     cs_free (w) ;                               /* free workspace */
00796     return (cs_sprealloc (A, 0)) ;              /* remove extra space from A */
00797 }
00798 /* add an entry to a triplet matrix; return 1 if ok, 0 otherwise */
00799 int cs_entry (cs *T, int i, int j, double x)
00800 {
00801     if (!CS_TRIPLET (T) || i < 0 || j < 0) return (0) ;     /* check inputs */
00802     if (T->nz >= T->nzmax && !cs_sprealloc (T,2*(T->nzmax))) return (0) ;
00803     if (T->x) T->x [T->nz] = x ;
00804     T->i [T->nz] = i ;
00805     T->p [T->nz++] = j ;
00806     T->m = CS_MAX (T->m, i+1) ;
00807     T->n = CS_MAX (T->n, j+1) ;
00808     return (1) ;
00809 }
00810 /* find nonzero pattern of Cholesky L(k,1:k-1) using etree and triu(A(:,k)) */
00811 int cs_ereach (const cs *A, int k, const int *parent, int *s, int *w)
00812 {
00813     int i, p, n, len, top, *Ap, *Ai ;
00814     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !parent || !s || !w) return (-1) ;   /* check inputs */
00815     top = n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ;
00816     CS_MARK (w, k) ;                /* mark node k as visited */
00817     for (p = Ap [k] ; p < Ap [k+1] ; p++)
00818     {
00819         i = Ai [p] ;                /* A(i,k) is nonzero */
00820         if (i > k) continue ;       /* only use upper triangular part of A */
00821         for (len = 0 ; !CS_MARKED (w,i) ; i = parent [i]) /* traverse up etree*/
00822         {
00823             s [len++] = i ;         /* L(k,i) is nonzero */
00824             CS_MARK (w, i) ;        /* mark i as visited */
00825         }
00826         while (len > 0) s [--top] = s [--len] ; /* push path onto stack */
00827     }
00828     for (p = top ; p < n ; p++) CS_MARK (w, s [p]) ;    /* unmark all nodes */
00829     CS_MARK (w, k) ;                /* unmark node k */
00830     return (top) ;                  /* s [top..n-1] contains pattern of L(k,:)*/
00831 }
00832 /* compute the etree of A (using triu(A), or A'A without forming A'A */
00833 int *cs_etree (const cs *A, int ata)
00834 {
00835     int i, k, p, m, n, inext, *Ap, *Ai, *w, *parent, *ancestor, *prev ;
00836     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;        /* check inputs */
00837     m = A->m ; n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ;
00838     parent = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;              /* allocate result */
00839     w = cs_malloc (n + (ata ? m : 0), sizeof (int)) ;   /* get workspace */
00840     if (!w || !parent) return (cs_idone (parent, NULL, w, 0)) ;
00841     ancestor = w ; prev = w + n ;
00842     if (ata) for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) prev [i] = -1 ;
00843     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)
00844     {
00845         parent [k] = -1 ;                   /* node k has no parent yet */
00846         ancestor [k] = -1 ;                 /* nor does k have an ancestor */
00847         for (p = Ap [k] ; p < Ap [k+1] ; p++)
00848         {
00849             i = ata ? (prev [Ai [p]]) : (Ai [p]) ;
00850             for ( ; i != -1 && i < k ; i = inext)   /* traverse from i to k */
00851             {
00852                 inext = ancestor [i] ;              /* inext = ancestor of i */
00853                 ancestor [i] = k ;                  /* path compression */
00854                 if (inext == -1) parent [i] = k ;   /* no anc., parent is k */
00855             }
00856             if (ata) prev [Ai [p]] = k ;
00857         }
00858     }
00859     return (cs_idone (parent, NULL, w, 1)) ;
00860 }
00861 /* drop entries for which fkeep(A(i,j)) is false; return nz if OK, else -1 */
00862 int cs_fkeep (cs *A, int (*fkeep) (int, int, double, void *), void *other)
00863 {
00864     int j, p, nz = 0, n, *Ap, *Ai ;
00865     double *Ax ;
00866     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !fkeep) return (-1) ;    /* check inputs */
00867     n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ;
00868     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
00869     {
00870         p = Ap [j] ;                        /* get current location of col j */
00871         Ap [j] = nz ;                       /* record new location of col j */
00872         for ( ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
00873         {
00874             if (fkeep (Ai [p], j, Ax ? Ax [p] : 1, other))
00875             {
00876                 if (Ax) Ax [nz] = Ax [p] ;  /* keep A(i,j) */
00877                 Ai [nz++] = Ai [p] ;
00878             }
00879         }
00880     }
00881     Ap [n] = nz ;                           /* finalize A */
00882     cs_sprealloc (A, 0) ;                   /* remove extra space from A */
00883     return (nz) ;
00884 }
00885 /* y = A*x+y */
00886 int cs_gaxpy (const cs *A, const double *x, double *y)
00887 {
00888     int p, j, n, *Ap, *Ai ;
00889     double *Ax ;
00890     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !x || !y) return (0) ;       /* check inputs */
00891     n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ;
00892     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
00893     {
00894         for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
00895         {
00896             y [Ai [p]] += Ax [p] * x [j] ;
00897         }
00898     }
00899     return (1) ;
00900 }
00901 /* apply the ith Householder vector to x */
00902 int cs_happly (const cs *V, int i, double beta, double *x)
00903 {
00904     int p, *Vp, *Vi ;
00905     double *Vx, tau = 0 ;
00906     if (!CS_CSC (V) || !x) return (0) ;     /* check inputs */
00907     Vp = V->p ; Vi = V->i ; Vx = V->x ;
00908     for (p = Vp [i] ; p < Vp [i+1] ; p++)   /* tau = v'*x */
00909     {
00910         tau += Vx [p] * x [Vi [p]] ;
00911     }
00912     tau *= beta ;                           /* tau = beta*(v'*x) */
00913     for (p = Vp [i] ; p < Vp [i+1] ; p++)   /* x = x - v*tau */
00914     {
00915         x [Vi [p]] -= Vx [p] * tau ;
00916     }
00917     return (1) ;
00918 }
00919 /* create a Householder reflection [v,beta,s]=house(x), overwrite x with v,
00920  * where (I-beta*v*v')*x = s*e1.  See Algo 5.1.1, Golub & Van Loan, 3rd ed. */
00921 double cs_house (double *x, double *beta, int n)
00922 {
00923     double s, sigma = 0 ;
00924     int i ;
00925     if (!x || !beta) return (-1) ;          /* check inputs */
00926     for (i = 1 ; i < n ; i++) sigma += x [i] * x [i] ;
00927     if (sigma == 0)
00928     {
00929         s = fabs (x [0]) ;                  /* s = |x(0)| */
00930         (*beta) = (x [0] <= 0) ? 2 : 0 ;
00931         x [0] = 1 ;
00932     }
00933     else
00934     {
00935         s = sqrt (x [0] * x [0] + sigma) ;  /* s = norm (x) */
00936         x [0] = (x [0] <= 0) ? (x [0] - s) : (-sigma / (x [0] + s)) ;
00937         (*beta) = -1. / (s * x [0]) ;
00938     }
00939     return (s) ;
00940 }
00941 /* x(p) = b, for dense vectors x and b; p=NULL denotes identity */
00942 int cs_ipvec (const int *p, const double *b, double *x, int n)
00943 {
00944     int k ;
00945     if (!x || !b) return (0) ;                              /* check inputs */
00946     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) x [p ? p [k] : k] = b [k] ;
00947     return (1) ;
00948 }
00949 /* consider A(i,j), node j in ith row subtree and return lca(jprev,j) */
00950 int cs_leaf (int i, int j, const int *first, int *maxfirst, int *prevleaf,
00951     int *ancestor, int *jleaf)
00952 {
00953     int q, s, sparent, jprev ;
00954     if (!first || !maxfirst || !prevleaf || !ancestor || !jleaf) return (-1) ;
00955     *jleaf = 0 ;
00956     if (i <= j || first [j] <= maxfirst [i]) return (-1) ;  /* j not a leaf */
00957     maxfirst [i] = first [j] ;      /* update max first[j] seen so far */
00958     jprev = prevleaf [i] ;          /* jprev = previous leaf of ith subtree */
00959     prevleaf [i] = j ;
00960     *jleaf = (jprev == -1) ? 1: 2 ; /* j is first or subsequent leaf */
00961     if (*jleaf == 1) return (i) ;   /* if 1st leaf, q = root of ith subtree */
00962     for (q = jprev ; q != ancestor [q] ; q = ancestor [q]) ;
00963     for (s = jprev ; s != q ; s = sparent)
00964     {
00965         sparent = ancestor [s] ;    /* path compression */
00966         ancestor [s] = q ;
00967     }
00968     return (q) ;                    /* q = least common ancester (jprev,j) */
00969 }
00970 /* load a triplet matrix from a file */
00971 cs *cs_load (FILE *f)
00972 {
00973     int i, j ;
00974     double x ;
00975     cs *T ;
00976     if (!f) return (NULL) ;                             /* check inputs */
00977     T = cs_spalloc (0, 0, 1, 1, 1) ;                    /* allocate result */
00978     while (fscanf (f, "%d %d %lg\n", &i, &j, &x) == 3)
00979     {
00980         if (!cs_entry (T, i, j, x)) return (cs_spfree (T)) ;
00981     }
00982     return (T) ;
00983 }
00984 /* solve Lx=b where x and b are dense.  x=b on input, solution on output. */
00985 int cs_lsolve (const cs *L, double *x)
00986 {
00987     int p, j, n, *Lp, *Li ;
00988     double *Lx ;
00989     if (!CS_CSC (L) || !x) return (0) ;                     /* check inputs */
00990     n = L->n ; Lp = L->p ; Li = L->i ; Lx = L->x ;
00991     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
00992     {
00993         x [j] /= Lx [Lp [j]] ;
00994         for (p = Lp [j]+1 ; p < Lp [j+1] ; p++)
00995         {
00996             x [Li [p]] -= Lx [p] * x [j] ;
00997         }
00998     }
00999     return (1) ;
01000 }
01001 /* solve L'x=b where x and b are dense.  x=b on input, solution on output. */
01002 int cs_ltsolve (const cs *L, double *x)
01003 {
01004     int p, j, n, *Lp, *Li ;
01005     double *Lx ;
01006     if (!CS_CSC (L) || !x) return (0) ;                     /* check inputs */
01007     n = L->n ; Lp = L->p ; Li = L->i ; Lx = L->x ;
01008     for (j = n-1 ; j >= 0 ; j--)
01009     {
01010         for (p = Lp [j]+1 ; p < Lp [j+1] ; p++)
01011         {
01012             x [j] -= Lx [p] * x [Li [p]] ;
01013         }
01014         x [j] /= Lx [Lp [j]] ;
01015     }
01016     return (1) ;
01017 }
01018 /* [L,U,pinv]=lu(A, [q lnz unz]). lnz and unz can be guess */
01019 csn *cs_lu (const cs *A, const css *S, double tol)
01020 {
01021     cs *L, *U ;
01022     csn *N ;
01023     double pivot, *Lx, *Ux, *x,  a, t ;
01024     int *Lp, *Li, *Up, *Ui, *pinv, *xi, *q, n, ipiv, k, top, p, i, col, lnz,unz;
01025     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !S) return (NULL) ;          /* check inputs */
01026     n = A->n ;
01027     q = S->q ; lnz = S->lnz ; unz = S->unz ;
01028     x = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (double)) ;            /* get double workspace */
01029     xi = cs_malloc (2*n, sizeof (int)) ;            /* get int workspace */
01030     N = cs_calloc (1, sizeof (csn)) ;               /* allocate result */
01031     if (!x || !xi || !N) return (cs_ndone (N, NULL, xi, x, 0)) ;
01032     N->L = L = cs_spalloc (n, n, lnz, 1, 0) ;       /* allocate result L */
01033     N->U = U = cs_spalloc (n, n, unz, 1, 0) ;       /* allocate result U */
01034     N->pinv = pinv = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;  /* allocate result pinv */
01035     if (!L || !U || !pinv) return (cs_ndone (N, NULL, xi, x, 0)) ;
01036     Lp = L->p ; Up = U->p ;
01037     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) x [i] = 0 ;           /* clear workspace */
01038     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) pinv [i] = -1 ;       /* no rows pivotal yet */
01039     for (k = 0 ; k <= n ; k++) Lp [k] = 0 ;         /* no cols of L yet */
01040     lnz = unz = 0 ;
01041     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)       /* compute L(:,k) and U(:,k) */
01042     {
01043         /* --- Triangular solve --------------------------------------------- */
01044         Lp [k] = lnz ;              /* L(:,k) starts here */
01045         Up [k] = unz ;              /* U(:,k) starts here */
01046         if ((lnz + n > L->nzmax && !cs_sprealloc (L, 2*L->nzmax + n)) ||
01047             (unz + n > U->nzmax && !cs_sprealloc (U, 2*U->nzmax + n)))
01048         {
01049             return (cs_ndone (N, NULL, xi, x, 0)) ;
01050         }
01051         Li = L->i ; Lx = L->x ; Ui = U->i ; Ux = U->x ;
01052         col = q ? (q [k]) : k ;
01053         top = cs_spsolve (L, A, col, xi, x, pinv, 1) ;  /* x = L\A(:,col) */
01054         /* --- Find pivot --------------------------------------------------- */
01055         ipiv = -1 ;
01056         a = -1 ;
01057         for (p = top ; p < n ; p++)
01058         {
01059             i = xi [p] ;            /* x(i) is nonzero */
01060             if (pinv [i] < 0)       /* row i is not yet pivotal */
01061             {
01062                 if ((t = fabs (x [i])) > a)
01063                 {
01064                     a = t ;         /* largest pivot candidate so far */
01065                     ipiv = i ;
01066                 }
01067             }
01068             else                    /* x(i) is the entry U(pinv[i],k) */
01069             {
01070                 Ui [unz] = pinv [i] ;
01071                 Ux [unz++] = x [i] ;
01072             }
01073         }
01074         if (ipiv == -1 || a <= 0) return (cs_ndone (N, NULL, xi, x, 0)) ;
01075         if (pinv [col] < 0 && fabs (x [col]) >= a*tol) ipiv = col ;
01076         /* --- Divide by pivot ---------------------------------------------- */
01077         pivot = x [ipiv] ;          /* the chosen pivot */
01078         Ui [unz] = k ;              /* last entry in U(:,k) is U(k,k) */
01079         Ux [unz++] = pivot ;
01080         pinv [ipiv] = k ;           /* ipiv is the kth pivot row */
01081         Li [lnz] = ipiv ;           /* first entry in L(:,k) is L(k,k) = 1 */
01082         Lx [lnz++] = 1 ;
01083         for (p = top ; p < n ; p++) /* L(k+1:n,k) = x / pivot */
01084         {
01085             i = xi [p] ;
01086             if (pinv [i] < 0)       /* x(i) is an entry in L(:,k) */
01087             {
01088                 Li [lnz] = i ;      /* save unpermuted row in L */
01089                 Lx [lnz++] = x [i] / pivot ;    /* scale pivot column */
01090             }
01091             x [i] = 0 ;             /* x [0..n-1] = 0 for next k */
01092         }
01093     }
01094     /* --- Finalize L and U ------------------------------------------------- */
01095     Lp [n] = lnz ;
01096     Up [n] = unz ;
01097     Li = L->i ;                     /* fix row indices of L for final pinv */
01098     for (p = 0 ; p < lnz ; p++) Li [p] = pinv [Li [p]] ;
01099     cs_sprealloc (L, 0) ;           /* remove extra space from L and U */
01100     cs_sprealloc (U, 0) ;
01101     return (cs_ndone (N, NULL, xi, x, 1)) ;     /* success */
01102 }
01103 /* x=A\b where A is unsymmetric; b overwritten with solution */
01104 int cs_lusol (int order, const cs *A, double *b, double tol)
01105 {
01106     double *x ;
01107     css *S ;
01108     csn *N ;
01109     int n, ok ;
01110     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !b) return (0) ;     /* check inputs */
01111     n = A->n ;
01112     S = cs_sqr (order, A, 0) ;              /* ordering and symbolic analysis */
01113     N = cs_lu (A, S, tol) ;                 /* numeric LU factorization */
01114     x = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (double)) ;    /* get workspace */
01115     ok = (S && N && x) ;
01116     if (ok)
01117     {
01118         cs_ipvec (N->pinv, b, x, n) ;       /* x = b(p) */
01119         cs_lsolve (N->L, x) ;               /* x = L\x */
01120         cs_usolve (N->U, x) ;               /* x = U\x */
01121         cs_ipvec (S->q, x, b, n) ;          /* b(q) = x */
01122     }
01123     cs_free (x) ;
01124     cs_sfree (S) ;
01125     cs_nfree (N) ;
01126     return (ok) ;
01127 }
01128 #ifdef MATLAB_MEX_FILE
01129 #define malloc mxMalloc
01130 #define free mxFree
01131 #define realloc mxRealloc
01132 #define calloc mxCalloc
01133 #endif
01134 
01135 /* wrapper for malloc */
01136 void *cs_malloc (int n, size_t size)
01137 {
01138     return (malloc (CS_MAX (n,1) * size)) ;
01139 }
01140 
01141 /* wrapper for calloc */
01142 void *cs_calloc (int n, size_t size)
01143 {
01144     return (calloc (CS_MAX (n,1), size)) ;
01145 }
01146 
01147 /* wrapper for free */
01148 void *cs_free (void *p)
01149 {
01150     if (p) free (p) ;       /* free p if it is not already NULL */
01151     return (NULL) ;         /* return NULL to simplify the use of cs_free */
01152 }
01153 
01154 /* wrapper for realloc */
01155 void *cs_realloc (void *p, int n, size_t size, int *ok)
01156 {
01157     void *pnew ;
01158     pnew = realloc (p, CS_MAX (n,1) * size) ; /* realloc the block */
01159     *ok = (pnew != NULL) ;                  /* realloc fails if pnew is NULL */
01160     return ((*ok) ? pnew : p) ;             /* return original p if failure */
01161 }
01162 /* find an augmenting path starting at column k and extend the match if found */
01163 static void cs_augment (int k, const cs *A, int *jmatch, int *cheap, int *w,
01164         int *js, int *is, int *ps)
01165 {
01166     int found = 0, p, i = -1, *Ap = A->p, *Ai = A->i, head = 0, j ;
01167     js [0] = k ;                        /* start with just node k in jstack */
01168     while (head >= 0)
01169     {
01170         /* --- Start (or continue) depth-first-search at node j ------------- */
01171         j = js [head] ;                 /* get j from top of jstack */
01172         if (w [j] != k)                 /* 1st time j visited for kth path */
01173         {
01174             w [j] = k ;                 /* mark j as visited for kth path */
01175             for (p = cheap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] && !found ; p++)
01176             {
01177                 i = Ai [p] ;            /* try a cheap assignment (i,j) */
01178                 found = (jmatch [i] == -1) ;
01179             }
01180             cheap [j] = p ;             /* start here next time j is traversed*/
01181             if (found)
01182             {
01183                 is [head] = i ;         /* column j matched with row i */
01184                 break ;                 /* end of augmenting path */
01185             }
01186             ps [head] = Ap [j] ;        /* no cheap match: start dfs for j */
01187         }
01188         /* --- Depth-first-search of neighbors of j ------------------------- */
01189         for (p = ps [head] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
01190         {
01191             i = Ai [p] ;                /* consider row i */
01192             if (w [jmatch [i]] == k) continue ; /* skip jmatch [i] if marked */
01193             ps [head] = p + 1 ;         /* pause dfs of node j */
01194             is [head] = i ;             /* i will be matched with j if found */
01195             js [++head] = jmatch [i] ;  /* start dfs at column jmatch [i] */
01196             break ;
01197         }
01198         if (p == Ap [j+1]) head-- ;     /* node j is done; pop from stack */
01199     }                                   /* augment the match if path found: */
01200     if (found) for (p = head ; p >= 0 ; p--) jmatch [is [p]] = js [p] ;
01201 }
01202 
01203 /* find a maximum transveral */
01204 int *cs_maxtrans (const cs *A, int seed)  /*[jmatch [0..m-1]; imatch [0..n-1]]*/
01205 {
01206     int i, j, k, n, m, p, n2 = 0, m2 = 0, *Ap, *jimatch, *w, *cheap, *js, *is,
01207         *ps, *Ai, *Cp, *jmatch, *imatch, *q ;
01208     cs *C ;
01209     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;                /* check inputs */
01210     n = A->n ; m = A->m ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ;
01211     w = jimatch = cs_calloc (m+n, sizeof (int)) ;   /* allocate result */
01212     if (!jimatch) return (NULL) ;
01213     for (k = 0, j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)    /* count nonempty rows and columns */
01214     {
01215         n2 += (Ap [j] < Ap [j+1]) ;
01216         for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
01217         {
01218             w [Ai [p]] = 1 ;
01219             k += (j == Ai [p]) ;        /* count entries already on diagonal */
01220         }
01221     }
01222     if (k == CS_MIN (m,n))              /* quick return if diagonal zero-free */
01223     {
01224         jmatch = jimatch ; imatch = jimatch + m ;
01225         for (i = 0 ; i < k ; i++) jmatch [i] = i ;
01226         for (      ; i < m ; i++) jmatch [i] = -1 ;
01227         for (j = 0 ; j < k ; j++) imatch [j] = j ;
01228         for (      ; j < n ; j++) imatch [j] = -1 ;
01229         return (cs_idone (jimatch, NULL, NULL, 1)) ;
01230     }
01231     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) m2 += w [i] ;
01232     C = (m2 < n2) ? cs_transpose (A,0) : ((cs *) A) ; /* transpose if needed */
01233     if (!C) return (cs_idone (jimatch, (m2 < n2) ? C : NULL, NULL, 0)) ;
01234     n = C->n ; m = C->m ; Cp = C->p ;
01235     jmatch = (m2 < n2) ? jimatch + n : jimatch ;
01236     imatch = (m2 < n2) ? jimatch : jimatch + m ;
01237     w = cs_malloc (5*n, sizeof (int)) ;             /* get workspace */
01238     if (!w) return (cs_idone (jimatch, (m2 < n2) ? C : NULL, w, 0)) ;
01239     cheap = w + n ; js = w + 2*n ; is = w + 3*n ; ps = w + 4*n ;
01240     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++) cheap [j] = Cp [j] ;  /* for cheap assignment */
01241     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++) w [j] = -1 ;          /* all columns unflagged */
01242     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) jmatch [i] = -1 ;     /* nothing matched yet */
01243     q = cs_randperm (n, seed) ;                     /* q = random permutation */
01244     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)   /* augment, starting at column q[k] */
01245     {
01246         cs_augment (q ? q [k]: k, C, jmatch, cheap, w, js, is, ps) ;
01247     }
01248     cs_free (q) ;
01249     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++) imatch [j] = -1 ;     /* find row match */
01250     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) if (jmatch [i] >= 0) imatch [jmatch [i]] = i ;
01251     return (cs_idone (jimatch, (m2 < n2) ? C : NULL, w, 1)) ;
01252 }
01253 /* C = A*B */
01254 cs *cs_multiply (const cs *A, const cs *B)
01255 {
01256     int p, j, nz = 0, anz, *Cp, *Ci, *Bp, m, n, bnz, *w, values, *Bi ;
01257     double *x, *Bx, *Cx ;
01258     cs *C ;
01259     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !CS_CSC (B)) return (NULL) ;      /* check inputs */
01260     if (A->n != B->m) return (NULL) ;
01261     m = A->m ; anz = A->p [A->n] ;
01262     n = B->n ; Bp = B->p ; Bi = B->i ; Bx = B->x ; bnz = Bp [n] ;
01263     w = cs_calloc (m, sizeof (int)) ;                    /* get workspace */
01264     values = (A->x != NULL) && (Bx != NULL) ;
01265     x = values ? cs_malloc (m, sizeof (double)) : NULL ; /* get workspace */
01266     C = cs_spalloc (m, n, anz + bnz, values, 0) ;        /* allocate result */
01267     if (!C || !w || (values && !x)) return (cs_done (C, w, x, 0)) ;
01268     Cp = C->p ;
01269     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
01270     {
01271         if (nz + m > C->nzmax && !cs_sprealloc (C, 2*(C->nzmax)+m))
01272         {
01273             return (cs_done (C, w, x, 0)) ;             /* out of memory */
01274         } 
01275         Ci = C->i ; Cx = C->x ;         /* C->i and C->x may be reallocated */
01276         Cp [j] = nz ;                   /* column j of C starts here */
01277         for (p = Bp [j] ; p < Bp [j+1] ; p++)
01278         {
01279             nz = cs_scatter (A, Bi [p], Bx ? Bx [p] : 1, w, x, j+1, C, nz) ;
01280         }
01281         if (values) for (p = Cp [j] ; p < nz ; p++) Cx [p] = x [Ci [p]] ;
01282     }
01283     Cp [n] = nz ;                       /* finalize the last column of C */
01284     cs_sprealloc (C, 0) ;               /* remove extra space from C */
01285     return (cs_done (C, w, x, 1)) ;     /* success; free workspace, return C */
01286 }
01287 /* 1-norm of a sparse matrix = max (sum (abs (A))), largest column sum */
01288 double cs_norm (const cs *A)
01289 {
01290     int p, j, n, *Ap ;
01291     double *Ax,  norm = 0, s ;
01292     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !A->x) return (-1) ;             /* check inputs */
01293     n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ax = A->x ;
01294     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
01295     {
01296         for (s = 0, p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++) s += fabs (Ax [p]) ;
01297         norm = CS_MAX (norm, s) ;
01298     }
01299     return (norm) ;
01300 }
01301 /* C = A(p,q) where p and q are permutations of 0..m-1 and 0..n-1. */
01302 cs *cs_permute (const cs *A, const int *pinv, const int *q, int values)
01303 {
01304     int t, j, k, nz = 0, m, n, *Ap, *Ai, *Cp, *Ci ;
01305     double *Cx, *Ax ;
01306     cs *C ;
01307     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;    /* check inputs */
01308     m = A->m ; n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ;
01309     C = cs_spalloc (m, n, Ap [n], values && Ax != NULL, 0) ;  /* alloc result */
01310     if (!C) return (cs_done (C, NULL, NULL, 0)) ;   /* out of memory */
01311     Cp = C->p ; Ci = C->i ; Cx = C->x ;
01312     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)
01313     {
01314         Cp [k] = nz ;                   /* column k of C is column q[k] of A */
01315         j = q ? (q [k]) : k ;
01316         for (t = Ap [j] ; t < Ap [j+1] ; t++)
01317         {
01318             if (Cx) Cx [nz] = Ax [t] ;  /* row i of A is row pinv[i] of C */
01319             Ci [nz++] = pinv ? (pinv [Ai [t]]) : Ai [t] ;
01320         }
01321     }
01322     Cp [n] = nz ;                       /* finalize the last column of C */
01323     return (cs_done (C, NULL, NULL, 1)) ;
01324 }
01325 /* pinv = p', or p = pinv' */
01326 int *cs_pinv (int const *p, int n)
01327 {
01328     int k, *pinv ;
01329     if (!p) return (NULL) ;                     /* p = NULL denotes identity */
01330     pinv = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;        /* allocate result */
01331     if (!pinv) return (NULL) ;                  /* out of memory */
01332     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) pinv [p [k]] = k ;/* invert the permutation */
01333     return (pinv) ;                             /* return result */
01334 }
01335 /* post order a forest */
01336 int *cs_post (const int *parent, int n)
01337 {
01338     int j, k = 0, *post, *w, *head, *next, *stack ;
01339     if (!parent) return (NULL) ;                        /* check inputs */
01340     post = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;                /* allocate result */
01341     w = cs_malloc (3*n, sizeof (int)) ;                 /* get workspace */
01342     if (!w || !post) return (cs_idone (post, NULL, w, 0)) ;
01343     head = w ; next = w + n ; stack = w + 2*n ;
01344     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++) head [j] = -1 ;           /* empty linked lists */
01345     for (j = n-1 ; j >= 0 ; j--)            /* traverse nodes in reverse order*/
01346     {
01347         if (parent [j] == -1) continue ;    /* j is a root */
01348         next [j] = head [parent [j]] ;      /* add j to list of its parent */
01349         head [parent [j]] = j ;
01350     }
01351     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
01352     {
01353         if (parent [j] != -1) continue ;    /* skip j if it is not a root */
01354         k = cs_tdfs (j, k, head, next, post, stack) ;
01355     }
01356     return (cs_idone (post, NULL, w, 1)) ;  /* success; free w, return post */
01357 }
01358 /* print a sparse matrix */
01359 int cs_print (const cs *A, int brief)
01360 {
01361     int p, j, m, n, nzmax, nz, *Ap, *Ai ;
01362     double *Ax ;
01363     if (!A) { printf ("(null)\n") ; return (0) ; }
01364     m = A->m ; n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ;
01365     nzmax = A->nzmax ; nz = A->nz ;
01366     printf ("CSparse Version %d.%d.%d, %s.  %s\n", CS_VER, CS_SUBVER,
01367         CS_SUBSUB, CS_DATE, CS_COPYRIGHT) ;
01368     if (nz < 0)
01369     {
01370         printf ("%d-by-%d, nzmax: %d nnz: %d, 1-norm: %g\n", m, n, nzmax,
01371                 Ap [n], cs_norm (A)) ;
01372         for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
01373         {
01374             printf ("    col %d : locations %d to %d\n", j, Ap [j], Ap [j+1]-1);
01375             for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
01376             {
01377                 printf ("      %d : %g\n", Ai [p], Ax ? Ax [p] : 1) ;
01378                 if (brief && p > 20) { printf ("  ...\n") ; return (1) ; }
01379             }
01380         }
01381     }
01382     else
01383     {
01384         printf ("triplet: %d-by-%d, nzmax: %d nnz: %d\n", m, n, nzmax, nz) ;
01385         for (p = 0 ; p < nz ; p++)
01386         {
01387             printf ("    %d %d : %g\n", Ai [p], Ap [p], Ax ? Ax [p] : 1) ;
01388             if (brief && p > 20) { printf ("  ...\n") ; return (1) ; }
01389         }
01390     }
01391     return (1) ;
01392 }
01393 /* x = b(p), for dense vectors x and b; p=NULL denotes identity */
01394 int cs_pvec (const int *p, const double *b, double *x, int n)
01395 {
01396     int k ;
01397     if (!x || !b) return (0) ;                              /* check inputs */
01398     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) x [k] = b [p ? p [k] : k] ;
01399     return (1) ;
01400 }
01401 /* sparse QR factorization [V,beta,pinv,R] = qr (A) */
01402 csn *cs_qr (const cs *A, const css *S)
01403 {
01404     double *Rx, *Vx, *Ax, *x,  *Beta ;
01405     int i, k, p, m, n, vnz, p1, top, m2, len, col, rnz, *s, *leftmost, *Ap, *Ai,
01406         *parent, *Rp, *Ri, *Vp, *Vi, *w, *pinv, *q ;
01407     cs *R, *V ;
01408     csn *N ;
01409     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !S) return (NULL) ;
01410     m = A->m ; n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ;
01411     q = S->q ; parent = S->parent ; pinv = S->pinv ; m2 = S->m2 ;
01412     vnz = S->lnz ; rnz = S->unz ; leftmost = S->leftmost ;
01413     w = cs_malloc (m2+n, sizeof (int)) ;            /* get int workspace */
01414     x = cs_malloc (m2, sizeof (double)) ;           /* get double workspace */
01415     N = cs_calloc (1, sizeof (csn)) ;               /* allocate result */
01416     if (!w || !x || !N) return (cs_ndone (N, NULL, w, x, 0)) ;
01417     s = w + m2 ;                                    /* s is size n */
01418     for (k = 0 ; k < m2 ; k++) x [k] = 0 ;          /* clear workspace x */
01419     N->L = V = cs_spalloc (m2, n, vnz, 1, 0) ;      /* allocate result V */
01420     N->U = R = cs_spalloc (m2, n, rnz, 1, 0) ;      /* allocate result R */
01421     N->B = Beta = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (double)) ;  /* allocate result Beta */
01422     if (!R || !V || !Beta) return (cs_ndone (N, NULL, w, x, 0)) ;
01423     Rp = R->p ; Ri = R->i ; Rx = R->x ;
01424     Vp = V->p ; Vi = V->i ; Vx = V->x ;
01425     for (i = 0 ; i < m2 ; i++) w [i] = -1 ; /* clear w, to mark nodes */
01426     rnz = 0 ; vnz = 0 ;
01427     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)               /* compute V and R */
01428     {
01429         Rp [k] = rnz ;                      /* R(:,k) starts here */
01430         Vp [k] = p1 = vnz ;                 /* V(:,k) starts here */
01431         w [k] = k ;                         /* add V(k,k) to pattern of V */
01432         Vi [vnz++] = k ;
01433         top = n ;
01434         col = q ? q [k] : k ;
01435         for (p = Ap [col] ; p < Ap [col+1] ; p++)   /* find R(:,k) pattern */
01436         {
01437             i = leftmost [Ai [p]] ;         /* i = min(find(A(i,q))) */
01438             for (len = 0 ; w [i] != k ; i = parent [i]) /* traverse up to k */
01439             {
01440                 s [len++] = i ;
01441                 w [i] = k ;
01442             }
01443             while (len > 0) s [--top] = s [--len] ; /* push path on stack */
01444             i = pinv [Ai [p]] ;             /* i = permuted row of A(:,col) */
01445             x [i] = Ax [p] ;                /* x (i) = A(:,col) */
01446             if (i > k && w [i] < k)         /* pattern of V(:,k) = x (k+1:m) */
01447             {
01448                 Vi [vnz++] = i ;            /* add i to pattern of V(:,k) */
01449                 w [i] = k ;
01450             }
01451         }
01452         for (p = top ; p < n ; p++) /* for each i in pattern of R(:,k) */
01453         {
01454             i = s [p] ;                     /* R(i,k) is nonzero */
01455             cs_happly (V, i, Beta [i], x) ; /* apply (V(i),Beta(i)) to x */
01456             Ri [rnz] = i ;                  /* R(i,k) = x(i) */
01457             Rx [rnz++] = x [i] ;
01458             x [i] = 0 ;
01459             if (parent [i] == k) vnz = cs_scatter (V, i, 0, w, NULL, k, V, vnz);
01460         }
01461         for (p = p1 ; p < vnz ; p++)        /* gather V(:,k) = x */
01462         {
01463             Vx [p] = x [Vi [p]] ;
01464             x [Vi [p]] = 0 ;
01465         }
01466         Ri [rnz] = k ;                     /* R(k,k) = norm (x) */
01467         Rx [rnz++] = cs_house (Vx+p1, Beta+k, vnz-p1) ; /* [v,beta]=house(x) */
01468     }
01469     Rp [n] = rnz ;                          /* finalize R */
01470     Vp [n] = vnz ;                          /* finalize V */
01471     return (cs_ndone (N, NULL, w, x, 1)) ;  /* success */
01472 }
01473 /* x=A\b where A can be rectangular; b overwritten with solution */
01474 int cs_qrsol (int order, const cs *A, double *b)
01475 {
01476     double *x ;
01477     css *S ;
01478     csn *N ;
01479     cs *AT = NULL ;
01480     int k, m, n, ok ;
01481     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !b) return (0) ; /* check inputs */
01482     n = A->n ;
01483     m = A->m ;
01484     if (m >= n)
01485     {
01486         S = cs_sqr (order, A, 1) ;          /* ordering and symbolic analysis */
01487         N = cs_qr (A, S) ;                  /* numeric QR factorization */
01488         x = cs_calloc (S ? S->m2 : 1, sizeof (double)) ;    /* get workspace */
01489         ok = (S && N && x) ;
01490         if (ok)
01491         {
01492             cs_ipvec (S->pinv, b, x, m) ;   /* x(0:m-1) = b(p(0:m-1) */
01493             for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)       /* apply Householder refl. to x */
01494             {
01495                 cs_happly (N->L, k, N->B [k], x) ;
01496             }
01497             cs_usolve (N->U, x) ;           /* x = R\x */
01498             cs_ipvec (S->q, x, b, n) ;      /* b(q(0:n-1)) = x(0:n-1) */
01499         }
01500     }
01501     else
01502     {
01503         AT = cs_transpose (A, 1) ;          /* Ax=b is underdetermined */
01504         S = cs_sqr (order, AT, 1) ;         /* ordering and symbolic analysis */
01505         N = cs_qr (AT, S) ;                 /* numeric QR factorization of A' */
01506         x = cs_calloc (S ? S->m2 : 1, sizeof (double)) ;    /* get workspace */
01507         ok = (AT && S && N && x) ;
01508         if (ok)
01509         {
01510             cs_pvec (S->q, b, x, m) ;       /* x(q(0:m-1)) = b(0:m-1) */
01511             cs_utsolve (N->U, x) ;          /* x = R'\x */
01512             for (k = m-1 ; k >= 0 ; k--)    /* apply Householder refl. to x */
01513             {
01514                 cs_happly (N->L, k, N->B [k], x) ;
01515             }
01516             cs_pvec (S->pinv, x, b, n) ;    /* b(0:n-1) = x(p(0:n-1)) */
01517         }
01518     }
01519     cs_free (x) ;
01520     cs_sfree (S) ;
01521     cs_nfree (N) ;
01522     cs_spfree (AT) ;
01523     return (ok) ;
01524 }
01525 /* return a random permutation vector, the identity perm, or p = n-1:-1:0.
01526  * seed = -1 means p = n-1:-1:0.  seed = 0 means p = identity.  otherwise
01527  * p = random permutation.  */
01528 int *cs_randperm (int n, int seed)
01529 {
01530     int *p, k, j, t ;
01531     if (seed == 0) return (NULL) ;      /* return p = NULL (identity) */
01532     p = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;   /* allocate result */
01533     if (!p) return (NULL) ;             /* out of memory */
01534     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) p [k] = n-k-1 ;
01535     if (seed == -1) return (p) ;        /* return reverse permutation */
01536     srand (seed) ;                      /* get new random number seed */
01537     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)
01538     {
01539         j = k + (rand ( ) % (n-k)) ;    /* j = rand int in range k to n-1 */
01540         t = p [j] ;                     /* swap p[k] and p[j] */
01541         p [j] = p [k] ;
01542         p [k] = t ;
01543     }
01544     return (p) ;
01545 }
01546 /* xi [top...n-1] = nodes reachable from graph of G*P' via nodes in B(:,k).
01547  * xi [n...2n-1] used as workspace */
01548 int cs_reach (cs *G, const cs *B, int k, int *xi, const int *pinv)
01549 {
01550     int p, n, top, *Bp, *Bi, *Gp ;
01551     if (!CS_CSC (G) || !CS_CSC (B) || !xi) return (-1) ;    /* check inputs */
01552     n = G->n ; Bp = B->p ; Bi = B->i ; Gp = G->p ;
01553     top = n ;
01554     for (p = Bp [k] ; p < Bp [k+1] ; p++)
01555     {
01556         if (!CS_MARKED (Gp, Bi [p]))    /* start a dfs at unmarked node i */
01557         {
01558             top = cs_dfs (Bi [p], G, top, xi, xi+n, pinv) ;
01559         }
01560     }
01561     for (p = top ; p < n ; p++) CS_MARK (Gp, xi [p]) ;  /* restore G */
01562     return (top) ;
01563 }
01564 /* x = x + beta * A(:,j), where x is a dense vector and A(:,j) is sparse */
01565 int cs_scatter (const cs *A, int j, double beta, int *w, double *x, int mark,
01566     cs *C, int nz)
01567 {
01568     int i, p, *Ap, *Ai, *Ci ;
01569     double *Ax ;
01570     if (!CS_CSC (A) || !w || !CS_CSC (C)) return (-1) ;     /* check inputs */
01571     Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ; Ci = C->i ;
01572     for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
01573     {
01574         i = Ai [p] ;                            /* A(i,j) is nonzero */
01575         if (w [i] < mark)
01576         {
01577             w [i] = mark ;                      /* i is new entry in column j */
01578             Ci [nz++] = i ;                     /* add i to pattern of C(:,j) */
01579             if (x) x [i] = beta * Ax [p] ;      /* x(i) = beta*A(i,j) */
01580         }
01581         else if (x) x [i] += beta * Ax [p] ;    /* i exists in C(:,j) already */
01582     }
01583     return (nz) ;
01584 }
01585 /* find the strongly connected components of a square matrix */
01586 csd *cs_scc (cs *A)     /* matrix A temporarily modified, then restored */
01587 {
01588     int n, i, k, b, nb = 0, top, *xi, *pstack, *p, *r, *Ap, *ATp, *rcopy, *Blk ;
01589     cs *AT ;
01590     csd *D ;
01591     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;                /* check inputs */
01592     n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ;
01593     D = cs_dalloc (n, 0) ;                          /* allocate result */
01594     AT = cs_transpose (A, 0) ;                      /* AT = A' */
01595     xi = cs_malloc (2*n+1, sizeof (int)) ;          /* get workspace */
01596     if (!D || !AT || !xi) return (cs_ddone (D, AT, xi, 0)) ;
01597     Blk = xi ; rcopy = pstack = xi + n ;
01598     p = D->p ; r = D->r ; ATp = AT->p ;
01599     top = n ;
01600     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++)   /* first dfs(A) to find finish times (xi) */
01601     {
01602         if (!CS_MARKED (Ap, i)) top = cs_dfs (i, A, top, xi, pstack, NULL) ;
01603     }
01604     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) CS_MARK (Ap, i) ; /* restore A; unmark all nodes*/
01605     top = n ;
01606     nb = n ;
01607     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)   /* dfs(A') to find strongly connnected comp */
01608     {
01609         i = xi [k] ;            /* get i in reverse order of finish times */
01610         if (CS_MARKED (ATp, i)) continue ;  /* skip node i if already ordered */
01611         r [nb--] = top ;        /* node i is the start of a component in p */
01612         top = cs_dfs (i, AT, top, p, pstack, NULL) ;
01613     }
01614     r [nb] = 0 ;                /* first block starts at zero; shift r up */
01615     for (k = nb ; k <= n ; k++) r [k-nb] = r [k] ;
01616     D->nb = nb = n-nb ;         /* nb = # of strongly connected components */
01617     for (b = 0 ; b < nb ; b++)  /* sort each block in natural order */
01618     {
01619         for (k = r [b] ; k < r [b+1] ; k++) Blk [p [k]] = b ;
01620     }
01621     for (b = 0 ; b <= nb ; b++) rcopy [b] = r [b] ;
01622     for (i = 0 ; i < n ; i++) p [rcopy [Blk [i]]++] = i ;
01623     return (cs_ddone (D, AT, xi, 1)) ;
01624 }
01625 /* ordering and symbolic analysis for a Cholesky factorization */
01626 css *cs_schol (int order, const cs *A)
01627 {
01628     int n, *c, *post, *P ;
01629     cs *C ;
01630     css *S ;
01631     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;        /* check inputs */
01632     n = A->n ;
01633     S = cs_calloc (1, sizeof (css)) ;       /* allocate result S */
01634     if (!S) return (NULL) ;                 /* out of memory */
01635     P = cs_amd (order, A) ;                 /* P = amd(A+A'), or natural */
01636     S->pinv = cs_pinv (P, n) ;              /* find inverse permutation */
01637     cs_free (P) ;
01638     if (order && !S->pinv) return (cs_sfree (S)) ;
