01639     C = cs_symperm (A, S->pinv, 0) ;        /* C = spones(triu(A(P,P))) */
01640     S->parent = cs_etree (C, 0) ;           /* find etree of C */
01641     post = cs_post (S->parent, n) ;         /* postorder the etree */
01642     c = cs_counts (C, S->parent, post, 0) ; /* find column counts of chol(C) */
01643     cs_free (post) ;
01644     cs_spfree (C) ;
01645     S->cp = cs_malloc (n+1, sizeof (int)) ; /* allocate result S->cp */
01646     S->unz = S->lnz = cs_cumsum (S->cp, c, n) ; /* find column pointers for L */
01647     cs_free (c) ;
01648     return ((S->lnz >= 0) ? S : cs_sfree (S)) ;
01649 }
01650 /* solve Gx=b(:,k), where G is either upper (lo=0) or lower (lo=1) triangular */
01651 int cs_spsolve (cs *G, const cs *B, int k, int *xi, double *x, const int *pinv,
01652     int lo)
01653 {
01654     int j, J, p, q, px, top, n, *Gp, *Gi, *Bp, *Bi ;
01655     double *Gx, *Bx ;
01656     if (!CS_CSC (G) || !CS_CSC (B) || !xi || !x) return (-1) ;
01657     Gp = G->p ; Gi = G->i ; Gx = G->x ; n = G->n ;
01658     Bp = B->p ; Bi = B->i ; Bx = B->x ;
01659     top = cs_reach (G, B, k, xi, pinv) ;        /* xi[top..n-1]=Reach(B(:,k)) */
01660     for (p = top ; p < n ; p++) x [xi [p]] = 0 ;    /* clear x */
01661     for (p = Bp [k] ; p < Bp [k+1] ; p++) x [Bi [p]] = Bx [p] ; /* scatter B */
01662     for (px = top ; px < n ; px++)
01663     {
01664         j = xi [px] ;                               /* x(j) is nonzero */
01665         J = pinv ? (pinv [j]) : j ;                 /* j maps to col J of G */
01666         if (J < 0) continue ;                       /* column J is empty */
01667         x [j] /= Gx [lo ? (Gp [J]) : (Gp [J+1]-1)] ;/* x(j) /= G(j,j) */
01668         p = lo ? (Gp [J]+1) : (Gp [J]) ;            /* lo: L(j,j) 1st entry */
01669         q = lo ? (Gp [J+1]) : (Gp [J+1]-1) ;        /* up: U(j,j) last entry */
01670         for ( ; p < q ; p++)
01671         {
01672             x [Gi [p]] -= Gx [p] * x [j] ;          /* x(i) -= G(i,j) * x(j) */
01673         }
01674     }
01675     return (top) ;                                  /* return top of stack */
01676 }
01677 /* compute nnz(V) = S->lnz, S->pinv, S->leftmost, S->m2 from A and S->parent */
01678 static int cs_vcount (const cs *A, css *S)
01679 {
01680     int i, k, p, pa, n = A->n, m = A->m, *Ap = A->p, *Ai = A->i, *next, *head,
01681         *tail, *nque, *pinv, *leftmost, *w, *parent = S->parent ;
01682     S->pinv = pinv = cs_malloc (m+n, sizeof (int)) ;        /* allocate pinv, */
01683     S->leftmost = leftmost = cs_malloc (m, sizeof (int)) ;  /* and leftmost */
01684     w = cs_malloc (m+3*n, sizeof (int)) ;   /* get workspace */
01685     if (!pinv || !w || !leftmost)
01686     {
01687         cs_free (w) ;                       /* pinv and leftmost freed later */
01688         return (0) ;                        /* out of memory */
01689     }
01690     next = w ; head = w + m ; tail = w + m + n ; nque = w + m + 2*n ;
01691     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) head [k] = -1 ;   /* queue k is empty */
01692     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) tail [k] = -1 ;
01693     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) nque [k] = 0 ;
01694     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) leftmost [i] = -1 ;
01695     for (k = n-1 ; k >= 0 ; k--)
01696     {
01697         for (p = Ap [k] ; p < Ap [k+1] ; p++)
01698         {
01699             leftmost [Ai [p]] = k ;         /* leftmost[i] = min(find(A(i,:)))*/
01700         }
01701     }
01702     for (i = m-1 ; i >= 0 ; i--)            /* scan rows in reverse order */
01703     {
01704         pinv [i] = -1 ;                     /* row i is not yet ordered */
01705         k = leftmost [i] ;
01706         if (k == -1) continue ;             /* row i is empty */
01707         if (nque [k]++ == 0) tail [k] = i ; /* first row in queue k */
01708         next [i] = head [k] ;               /* put i at head of queue k */
01709         head [k] = i ;
01710     }
01711     S->lnz = 0 ;
01712     S->m2 = m ;
01713     for (k = 0 ; k < n ; k++)               /* find row permutation and nnz(V)*/
01714     {
01715         i = head [k] ;                      /* remove row i from queue k */
01716         S->lnz++ ;                          /* count V(k,k) as nonzero */
01717         if (i < 0) i = S->m2++ ;            /* add a fictitious row */
01718         pinv [i] = k ;                      /* associate row i with V(:,k) */
01719         if (--nque [k] <= 0) continue ;     /* skip if V(k+1:m,k) is empty */
01720         S->lnz += nque [k] ;                /* nque [k] is nnz (V(k+1:m,k)) */
01721         if ((pa = parent [k]) != -1)        /* move all rows to parent of k */
01722         {
01723             if (nque [pa] == 0) tail [pa] = tail [k] ;
01724             next [tail [k]] = head [pa] ;
01725             head [pa] = next [i] ;
01726             nque [pa] += nque [k] ;
01727         }
01728     }
01729     for (i = 0 ; i < m ; i++) if (pinv [i] < 0) pinv [i] = k++ ;
01730     cs_free (w) ;
01731     return (1) ;
01732 }
01733 
01734 /* symbolic ordering and analysis for QR or LU */
01735 css *cs_sqr (int order, const cs *A, int qr)
01736 {
01737     int n, k, ok = 1, *post ;
01738     css *S ;
01739     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;        /* check inputs */
01740     n = A->n ;
01741     S = cs_calloc (1, sizeof (css)) ;       /* allocate result S */
01742     if (!S) return (NULL) ;                 /* out of memory */
01743     S->q = cs_amd (order, A) ;              /* fill-reducing ordering */
01744     if (order && !S->q) return (cs_sfree (S)) ;
01745     if (qr)                                 /* QR symbolic analysis */
01746     {
01747         cs *C = order ? cs_permute (A, NULL, S->q, 0) : ((cs *) A) ;
01748         S->parent = cs_etree (C, 1) ;       /* etree of C'*C, where C=A(:,q) */
01749         post = cs_post (S->parent, n) ;
01750         S->cp = cs_counts (C, S->parent, post, 1) ;  /* col counts chol(C'*C) */
01751         cs_free (post) ;
01752         ok = C && S->parent && S->cp && cs_vcount (C, S) ;
01753         if (ok) for (S->unz = 0, k = 0 ; k < n ; k++) S->unz += S->cp [k] ;
01754         ok = ok && S->lnz >= 0 && S->unz >= 0 ;     /* int overflow guard */
01755         if (order) cs_spfree (C) ;
01756     }
01757     else
01758     {
01759         S->unz = 4*(A->p [n]) + n ;         /* for LU factorization only, */
01760         S->lnz = S->unz ;                   /* guess nnz(L) and nnz(U) */
01761     }
01762     return (ok ? S : cs_sfree (S)) ;        /* return result S */
01763 }
01764 /* C = A(p,p) where A and C are symmetric the upper part stored; pinv not p */
01765 cs *cs_symperm (const cs *A, const int *pinv, int values)
01766 {
01767     int i, j, p, q, i2, j2, n, *Ap, *Ai, *Cp, *Ci, *w ;
01768     double *Cx, *Ax ;
01769     cs *C ;
01770     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;                    /* check inputs */
01771     n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ;
01772     C = cs_spalloc (n, n, Ap [n], values && (Ax != NULL), 0) ; /* alloc result*/
01773     w = cs_calloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;                   /* get workspace */
01774     if (!C || !w) return (cs_done (C, w, NULL, 0)) ;    /* out of memory */
01775     Cp = C->p ; Ci = C->i ; Cx = C->x ;
01776     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)           /* count entries in each column of C */
01777     {
01778         j2 = pinv ? pinv [j] : j ;      /* column j of A is column j2 of C */
01779         for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
01780         {
01781             i = Ai [p] ;
01782             if (i > j) continue ;       /* skip lower triangular part of A */
01783             i2 = pinv ? pinv [i] : i ;  /* row i of A is row i2 of C */
01784             w [CS_MAX (i2, j2)]++ ;     /* column count of C */
01785         }
01786     }
01787     cs_cumsum (Cp, w, n) ;              /* compute column pointers of C */
01788     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
01789     {
01790         j2 = pinv ? pinv [j] : j ;      /* column j of A is column j2 of C */
01791         for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
01792         {
01793             i = Ai [p] ;
01794             if (i > j) continue ;       /* skip lower triangular part of A*/
01795             i2 = pinv ? pinv [i] : i ;  /* row i of A is row i2 of C */
01796             Ci [q = w [CS_MAX (i2, j2)]++] = CS_MIN (i2, j2) ;
01797             if (Cx) Cx [q] = Ax [p] ;
01798         }
01799     }
01800     return (cs_done (C, w, NULL, 1)) ;  /* success; free workspace, return C */
01801 }
01802 /* depth-first search and postorder of a tree rooted at node j */
01803 int cs_tdfs (int j, int k, int *head, const int *next, int *post, int *stack)
01804 {
01805     int i, p, top = 0 ;
01806     if (!head || !next || !post || !stack) return (-1) ;    /* check inputs */
01807     stack [0] = j ;                 /* place j on the stack */
01808     while (top >= 0)                /* while (stack is not empty) */
01809     {
01810         p = stack [top] ;           /* p = top of stack */
01811         i = head [p] ;              /* i = youngest child of p */
01812         if (i == -1)
01813         {
01814             top-- ;                 /* p has no unordered children left */
01815             post [k++] = p ;        /* node p is the kth postordered node */
01816         }
01817         else
01818         {
01819             head [p] = next [i] ;   /* remove i from children of p */
01820             stack [++top] = i ;     /* start dfs on child node i */
01821         }
01822     }
01823     return (k) ;
01824 }
01825 /* C = A' */
01826 cs *cs_transpose (const cs *A, int values)
01827 {
01828     int p, q, j, *Cp, *Ci, n, m, *Ap, *Ai, *w ;
01829     double *Cx, *Ax ;
01830     cs *C ;
01831     if (!CS_CSC (A)) return (NULL) ;    /* check inputs */
01832     m = A->m ; n = A->n ; Ap = A->p ; Ai = A->i ; Ax = A->x ;
01833     C = cs_spalloc (n, m, Ap [n], values && Ax, 0) ;       /* allocate result */
01834     w = cs_calloc (m, sizeof (int)) ;                      /* get workspace */
01835     if (!C || !w) return (cs_done (C, w, NULL, 0)) ;       /* out of memory */
01836     Cp = C->p ; Ci = C->i ; Cx = C->x ;
01837     for (p = 0 ; p < Ap [n] ; p++) w [Ai [p]]++ ;          /* row counts */
01838     cs_cumsum (Cp, w, m) ;                                 /* row pointers */
01839     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
01840     {
01841         for (p = Ap [j] ; p < Ap [j+1] ; p++)
01842         {
01843             Ci [q = w [Ai [p]]++] = j ; /* place A(i,j) as entry C(j,i) */
01844             if (Cx) Cx [q] = Ax [p] ;
01845         }
01846     }
01847     return (cs_done (C, w, NULL, 1)) ;  /* success; free w and return C */
01848 }
01849 /* sparse Cholesky update/downdate, L*L' + sigma*w*w' (sigma = +1 or -1) */
01850 int cs_updown (cs *L, int sigma, const cs *C, const int *parent)
01851 {
01852     int n, p, f, j, *Lp, *Li, *Cp, *Ci ;
01853     double *Lx, *Cx, alpha, beta = 1, delta, gamma, w1, w2, *w, beta2 = 1 ;
01854     if (!CS_CSC (L) || !CS_CSC (C) || !parent) return (0) ;  /* check inputs */
01855     Lp = L->p ; Li = L->i ; Lx = L->x ; n = L->n ;
01856     Cp = C->p ; Ci = C->i ; Cx = C->x ;
01857     if ((p = Cp [0]) >= Cp [1]) return (1) ;        /* return if C empty */
01858     w = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (double)) ;            /* get workspace */
01859     if (!w) return (0) ;                            /* out of memory */
01860     f = Ci [p] ;
01861     for ( ; p < Cp [1] ; p++) f = CS_MIN (f, Ci [p]) ;  /* f = min (find (C)) */
01862     for (j = f ; j != -1 ; j = parent [j]) w [j] = 0 ;  /* clear workspace w */
01863     for (p = Cp [0] ; p < Cp [1] ; p++) w [Ci [p]] = Cx [p] ; /* w = C */
01864     for (j = f ; j != -1 ; j = parent [j])          /* walk path f up to root */
01865     {
01866         p = Lp [j] ;
01867         alpha = w [j] / Lx [p] ;                    /* alpha = w(j) / L(j,j) */
01868         beta2 = beta*beta + sigma*alpha*alpha ;
01869         if (beta2 <= 0) break ;                     /* not positive definite */
01870         beta2 = sqrt (beta2) ;
01871         delta = (sigma > 0) ? (beta / beta2) : (beta2 / beta) ;
01872         gamma = sigma * alpha / (beta2 * beta) ;
01873         Lx [p] = delta * Lx [p] + ((sigma > 0) ? (gamma * w [j]) : 0) ;
01874         beta = beta2 ;
01875         for (p++ ; p < Lp [j+1] ; p++)
01876         {
01877             w1 = w [Li [p]] ;
01878             w [Li [p]] = w2 = w1 - alpha * Lx [p] ;
01879             Lx [p] = delta * Lx [p] + gamma * ((sigma > 0) ? w1 : w2) ;
01880         }
01881     }
01882     cs_free (w) ;
01883     return (beta2 > 0) ;
01884 }
01885 /* solve Ux=b where x and b are dense.  x=b on input, solution on output. */
01886 int cs_usolve (const cs *U, double *x)
01887 {
01888     int p, j, n, *Up, *Ui ;
01889     double *Ux ;
01890     if (!CS_CSC (U) || !x) return (0) ;                     /* check inputs */
01891     n = U->n ; Up = U->p ; Ui = U->i ; Ux = U->x ;
01892     for (j = n-1 ; j >= 0 ; j--)
01893     {
01894         x [j] /= Ux [Up [j+1]-1] ;
01895         for (p = Up [j] ; p < Up [j+1]-1 ; p++)
01896         {
01897             x [Ui [p]] -= Ux [p] * x [j] ;
01898         }
01899     }
01900     return (1) ;
01901 }
01902 /* allocate a sparse matrix (triplet form or compressed-column form) */
01903 cs *cs_spalloc (int m, int n, int nzmax, int values, int triplet)
01904 {
01905     cs *A = cs_calloc (1, sizeof (cs)) ;    /* allocate the cs struct */
01906     if (!A) return (NULL) ;                 /* out of memory */
01907     A->m = m ;                              /* define dimensions and nzmax */
01908     A->n = n ;
01909     A->nzmax = nzmax = CS_MAX (nzmax, 1) ;
01910     A->nz = triplet ? 0 : -1 ;              /* allocate triplet or comp.col */
01911     A->p = cs_malloc (triplet ? nzmax : n+1, sizeof (int)) ;
01912     A->i = cs_malloc (nzmax, sizeof (int)) ;
01913     A->x = values ? cs_malloc (nzmax, sizeof (double)) : NULL ;
01914     return ((!A->p || !A->i || (values && !A->x)) ? cs_spfree (A) : A) ;
01915 }
01916 
01917 /* change the max # of entries sparse matrix */
01918 int cs_sprealloc (cs *A, int nzmax)
01919 {
01920     int ok, oki, okj = 1, okx = 1 ;
01921     if (!A) return (0) ;
01922     if (nzmax <= 0) nzmax = (CS_CSC (A)) ? (A->p [A->n]) : A->nz ;
01923     A->i = cs_realloc (A->i, nzmax, sizeof (int), &oki) ;
01924     if (CS_TRIPLET (A)) A->p = cs_realloc (A->p, nzmax, sizeof (int), &okj) ;
01925     if (A->x) A->x = cs_realloc (A->x, nzmax, sizeof (double), &okx) ;
01926     ok = (oki && okj && okx) ;
01927     if (ok) A->nzmax = nzmax ;
01928     return (ok) ;
01929 }
01930 
01931 /* free a sparse matrix */
01932 cs *cs_spfree (cs *A)
01933 {
01934     if (!A) return (NULL) ;     /* do nothing if A already NULL */
01935     cs_free (A->p) ;
01936     cs_free (A->i) ;
01937     cs_free (A->x) ;
01938     return (cs_free (A)) ;      /* free the cs struct and return NULL */
01939 }
01940 
01941 /* free a numeric factorization */
01942 csn *cs_nfree (csn *N)
01943 {
01944     if (!N) return (NULL) ;     /* do nothing if N already NULL */
01945     cs_spfree (N->L) ;
01946     cs_spfree (N->U) ;
01947     cs_free (N->pinv) ;
01948     cs_free (N->B) ;
01949     return (cs_free (N)) ;      /* free the csn struct and return NULL */
01950 }
01951 
01952 /* free a symbolic factorization */
01953 css *cs_sfree (css *S)
01954 {
01955     if (!S) return (NULL) ;     /* do nothing if S already NULL */
01956     cs_free (S->pinv) ;
01957     cs_free (S->q) ;
01958     cs_free (S->parent) ;
01959     cs_free (S->cp) ;
01960     cs_free (S->leftmost) ;
01961     return (cs_free (S)) ;      /* free the css struct and return NULL */
01962 }
01963 
01964 /* allocate a cs_dmperm or cs_scc result */
01965 csd *cs_dalloc (int m, int n)
01966 {
01967     csd *D ;
01968     D = cs_calloc (1, sizeof (csd)) ;
01969     if (!D) return (NULL) ;
01970     D->p = cs_malloc (m, sizeof (int)) ;
01971     D->r = cs_malloc (m+6, sizeof (int)) ;
01972     D->q = cs_malloc (n, sizeof (int)) ;
01973     D->s = cs_malloc (n+6, sizeof (int)) ;
01974     return ((!D->p || !D->r || !D->q || !D->s) ? cs_dfree (D) : D) ;
01975 }
01976 
01977 /* free a cs_dmperm or cs_scc result */
01978 csd *cs_dfree (csd *D)
01979 {
01980     if (!D) return (NULL) ;     /* do nothing if D already NULL */
01981     cs_free (D->p) ;
01982     cs_free (D->q) ;
01983     cs_free (D->r) ;
01984     cs_free (D->s) ;
01985     return (cs_free (D)) ;
01986 }
01987 
01988 /* free workspace and return a sparse matrix result */
01989 cs *cs_done (cs *C, void *w, void *x, int ok)
01990 {
01991     cs_free (w) ;                       /* free workspace */
01992     cs_free (x) ;
01993     return (ok ? C : cs_spfree (C)) ;   /* return result if OK, else free it */
01994 }
01995 
01996 /* free workspace and return int array result */
01997 int *cs_idone (int *p, cs *C, void *w, int ok)
01998 {
01999     cs_spfree (C) ;                     /* free temporary matrix */
02000     cs_free (w) ;                       /* free workspace */
02001     return (ok ? p : cs_free (p)) ;     /* return result if OK, else free it */
02002 }
02003 
02004 /* free workspace and return a numeric factorization (Cholesky, LU, or QR) */
02005 csn *cs_ndone (csn *N, cs *C, void *w, void *x, int ok)
02006 {
02007     cs_spfree (C) ;                     /* free temporary matrix */
02008     cs_free (w) ;                       /* free workspace */
02009     cs_free (x) ;
02010     return (ok ? N : cs_nfree (N)) ;    /* return result if OK, else free it */
02011 }
02012 
02013 /* free workspace and return a csd result */
02014 csd *cs_ddone (csd *D, cs *C, void *w, int ok)
02015 {
02016     cs_spfree (C) ;                     /* free temporary matrix */
02017     cs_free (w) ;                       /* free workspace */
02018     return (ok ? D : cs_dfree (D)) ;    /* return result if OK, else free it */
02019 }
02020 /* solve U'x=b where x and b are dense.  x=b on input, solution on output. */
02021 int cs_utsolve (const cs *U, double *x)
02022 {
02023     int p, j, n, *Up, *Ui ;
02024     double *Ux ;
02025     if (!CS_CSC (U) || !x) return (0) ;                     /* check inputs */
02026     n = U->n ; Up = U->p ; Ui = U->i ; Ux = U->x ;
02027     for (j = 0 ; j < n ; j++)
02028     {
02029         for (p = Up [j] ; p < Up [j+1]-1 ; p++)
02030         {
02031             x [j] -= Ux [p] * x [Ui [p]] ;
02032         }
02033         x [j] /= Ux [Up [j+1]-1] ;
02034     }
02035     return (1) ;
02036 }
